class FileProcessor:
    """æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†å™¨ - å¤„ç†å„ç§æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹çš„è¯†åˆ«å’Œè½¬æ¢"""
    
    @staticmethod
    def is_url(path: str) -> bool:
        """åˆ¤æ–­è·¯å¾„æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºURLåœ°å€"""
        return path.startswith(('http://', 'https://'))
    
    @staticmethod
    def is_image(path: str) -> bool:
        """åˆ¤æ–­æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºå›¾ç‰‡ç±»å‹"""
        image_exts = ('.jpg', '.jpeg', '.png', '.gif', '.bmp', '.webp', '.svg', '.tiff', '.ico')
        return path.lower().endswith(image_exts) or ('image' in path.lower())
    
    @staticmethod
    def is_video(path: str) -> bool:
        """åˆ¤æ–­æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºè§†é¢‘ç±»å‹"""
        video_exts = ('.mp4', '.avi', '.mov', '.wmv', '.flv', '.webm', '.mkv', '.3gp', '.m4v')
        return path.lower().endswith(video_exts) or ('video' in path.lower())
    
    @staticmethod
    def is_audio(path: str) -> bool:
        """åˆ¤æ–­æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºéŸ³é¢‘ç±»å‹"""
        audio_exts = ('.mp3', '.wav', '.flac', '.aac', '.ogg', '.wma', '.m4a', '.opus')
        return path.lower().endswith(audio_exts) or ('audio' in path.lower())
    
    @staticmethod
    def is_document(path: str) -> bool:
        """åˆ¤æ–­æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºæ–‡æ¡£ç±»å‹"""
        doc_exts = ('.pdf', '.doc', '.docx', '.txt', '.md', '.rtf', '.csv', '.xlsx', '.ppt', '.pptx')
        return path.lower().endswith(doc_exts)
    
    @staticmethod
    async def download_file(url: str, temp_dir: str) -> str:
        """ä¸‹è½½ç½‘ç»œæ–‡ä»¶åˆ°æœ¬åœ°ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶"""
        try:
            async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
                async with session.get(url) as response:
                    if response.status == 200:
                        content = await response.read()
                        # ä»URLæˆ–Content-Typeæ¨æ–­æ–‡ä»¶æ‰©å±•å
                        content_type = response.headers.get('content-type', '')
                        if 'image' in content_type:
                            ext = content_type.split('/')[-1] if '/' in content_type else 'jpg'
                        elif 'video' in content_type:
                            ext = content_type.split('/')[-1] if '/' in content_type else 'mp4'
                        elif 'audio' in content_type:
                            ext = content_type.split('/')[-1] if '/' in content_type else 'mp3'
                        elif 'pdf' in content_type:
                            ext = 'pdf'
                        else:
                            # ä»URLæ¨æ–­
                            ext = url.split('.')[-1] if '.' in url else 'bin'
                        
                        temp_path = os.path.join(temp_dir, f"{uuid.uuid4().hex}.{ext}")
                        async with aiofiles.open(temp_path, 'wb') as f:
                            await f.write(content)
                        return temp_path
                    else:
                        raise Exception(f"ä¸‹è½½å¤±è´¥: HTTP {response.status}")
        except Exception as e:
            raise Exception(f"ä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
    
    @staticmethod
    def text_to_temp_document(text: str, max_chars: int = 131072) -> str:
        """å°†æ–‡æœ¬è½¬æ¢ä¸ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡æ¡£æ–‡ä»¶"""
        if len(text) > max_chars:
            text = text[:max_chars]
        
        with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='w', suffix='.txt', delete=False, encoding='utf-8') as f:
            f.write(text)
            return f.name
    
    @staticmethod
    def analyze_files(file_paths: Union[str, List[str]]) -> Dict[str, List[str]]:
        """åˆ†ææ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹å¹¶åˆ†ç±»"""
        if isinstance(file_paths, str):
            file_paths = [file_paths]
        
        result = {
            'images': [],
            'videos': [],
            'audios': [],
            'documents': [],
            'unknown': []
        }
        
        for path in file_paths:
            if FileProcessor.is_image(path):
                result['images'].append(path)
            elif FileProcessor.is_video(path):
                result['videos'].append(path)
            elif FileProcessor.is_audio(path):
                result['audios'].append(path)
            elif FileProcessor.is_document(path):
                result['documents'].append(path)
            else:
                result['unknown'].append(path)
        
        return result

class TimeoutManager:
    """è¶…æ—¶ç®¡ç†å™¨ - ç®¡ç†AIæ¨¡å‹å“åº”çš„è¶…æ—¶æ§åˆ¶"""
    
    def __init__(self, first_token_timeout: float = 60.0):
        """
        åˆå§‹åŒ–è¶…æ—¶ç®¡ç†å™¨
        
        Args:
            first_token_timeout: é¦–ä¸ªtokençš„è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´ï¼ˆç§’ï¼‰
        """
        self.first_token_timeout = first_token_timeout
    
    async def wait_for_first_token(self, async_gen: AsyncGenerator) -> AsyncGenerator:
        """
        ç­‰å¾…é¦–ä¸ªtokenï¼Œè¶…æ—¶åˆ™æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸
        
        Args:
            async_gen: å¼‚æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
            
        Returns:
            åŒ…è£…åçš„å¼‚æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
            
        Raises:
            asyncio.TimeoutError: é¦–åŒ…å»¶è¿Ÿè¶…æ—¶
        """
        first_token_received = False
        start_time = time.time()
        
        try:
            async for chunk in async_gen:
                if not first_token_received:
                    elapsed = time.time() - start_time
                    if elapsed > self.first_token_timeout:
                        raise asyncio.TimeoutError(f"é¦–åŒ…å»¶è¿Ÿè¶…æ—¶: {elapsed:.2f}s")
                    first_token_received = True
                yield chunk
        except asyncio.TimeoutError:
            raise
        except Exception as e:
            if not first_token_received:
                elapsed = time.time() - start_time
                if elapsed > self.first_token_timeout:
                    raise asyncio.TimeoutError(f"é¦–åŒ…å»¶è¿Ÿè¶…æ—¶: {elapsed:.2f}s")
            raise e

class ClientHandler:
    """ç»Ÿä¸€å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å¤„ç†å™¨ - ä¼˜åŒ–é«˜å¹¶å‘æ€§èƒ½ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šæ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨å’Œå›é€€æœºåˆ¶"""
    
    def __init__(self, max_concurrent: int = 100, first_token_timeout: float = 15.0):
        """
        åˆå§‹åŒ–å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å¤„ç†å™¨
        
        Args:
            max_concurrent: æœ€å¤§å¹¶å‘æ•°
            first_token_timeout: é¦–åŒ…è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´
        """
        # å¤§å¹…æå‡å¹¶å‘é™åˆ¶
        self.max_concurrent = max_concurrent
        self.chat_semaphore = asyncio.Semaphore(max_concurrent)
        self.embed_semaphore = asyncio.Semaphore(10)  # åµŒå…¥è¯·æ±‚é™åˆ¶
        self.download_semaphore = asyncio.Semaphore(20)  # ä¸‹è½½æ–‡ä»¶é™åˆ¶
        
        self.timeout_manager = TimeoutManager(first_token_timeout)
        
        # ä½¿ç”¨æ›´å¤§çš„çº¿ç¨‹æ± ä»¥æ”¯æŒé«˜å¹¶å‘
        self.thread_pool = ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=50)
        
        # åˆå§‹åŒ–å®¢æˆ·ç«¯
        self.ollama_client = None
        self.suanli_client = None
        self.embed_client = None
        self._client_lock = threading.Lock()
        
        # ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶ç®¡ç†
        self.temp_dir = tempfile.mkdtemp()
        self.temp_files = set()
        self._temp_lock = threading.Lock()
        
        # ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
        self.stats = {
            'total_requests': 0,
            'successful_requests': 0,
            'model_usage': {config['name']: 0 for config in ModelConfig.FALLBACK_ORDER},
            'fallback_usage': 0,
            'file_downloads': 0,
            'multimodal_rejections': 0,
            'direct_model_calls': 0
        }
    
    def _get_ollama_client(self) -> OllamaClient:
        """è·å–Ollamaå®¢æˆ·ç«¯å®ä¾‹ï¼ˆå•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼ï¼‰"""
        if self.ollama_client is None:
            with self._client_lock:
                if self.ollama_client is None:
                    self.ollama_client = OllamaClient()
        return self.ollama_client
    
    def _get_suanli_client(self) -> SuanliClient:
        """è·å–Suanliå®¢æˆ·ç«¯å®ä¾‹ï¼ˆå•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼ï¼‰"""
        if self.suanli_client is None:
            with self._client_lock:
                if self.suanli_client is None:
                    self.suanli_client = SuanliClient()
        return self.suanli_client
    
    def _get_embed_client(self) -> EmbedClient:
        """è·å–åµŒå…¥å®¢æˆ·ç«¯å®ä¾‹ï¼ˆå•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼ï¼‰"""
        if self.embed_client is None:
            with self._client_lock:
                if self.embed_client is None:
                    self.embed_client = EmbedClient()
        return self.embed_client
    
    def _add_temp_file(self, file_path: str) -> None:
        """æ·»åŠ ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶åˆ°ç®¡ç†åˆ—è¡¨"""
        with self._temp_lock:
            self.temp_files.add(file_path)
    
    def _remove_temp_file(self, file_path: str) -> None:
        """ä»ç®¡ç†åˆ—è¡¨ç§»é™¤ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶"""
        with self._temp_lock:
            self.temp_files.discard(file_path)
            if os.path.exists(file_path):
                try:
                    os.unlink(file_path)
                except:
                    pass
    
    def _truncate_text(self, text: str, max_length: int) -> str:
        """æˆªæ–­æ–‡æœ¬åˆ°æŒ‡å®šé•¿åº¦"""
        if len(text) <= max_length:
            return text
        return text[:max_length]
    
    def _validate_files_for_model(self, model_config: Dict, file_paths: List[str]) -> Tuple[bool, str]:
        """
        éªŒè¯æ¨¡å‹æ˜¯å¦èƒ½å¤„ç†æŒ‡å®šçš„æ–‡ä»¶
        
        Args:
            model_config: æ¨¡å‹é…ç½®å­—å…¸
            file_paths: æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„åˆ—è¡¨
            
        Returns:
            (æ˜¯å¦å¯ä»¥å¤„ç†, é”™è¯¯æ¶ˆæ¯)
        """
        if not file_paths:
            return True, ""
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥æ–‡ä»¶æ•°é‡é™åˆ¶
        if len(file_paths) > model_config.get('max_files', 0):
            if model_config['name'] == 'QWEN':
                return False, f"æ–‡ä»¶æ•°é‡è¶…é™: {len(file_paths)} > {model_config['max_files']}"
            else:
                return False, f"æ¨¡å‹ {model_config['name']} ä¸æ”¯æŒå¤šæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå½“å‰æœ‰ {len(file_paths)} ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶"
        
        # åˆ†ææ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹
        file_analysis = FileProcessor.analyze_files(file_paths)
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥å„ç§æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹æ”¯æŒ
        if file_analysis['images'] and not model_config.get('supports_vision'):
            return False, f"æ¨¡å‹ {model_config['name']} ä¸æ”¯æŒå›¾åƒæ–‡ä»¶"
        
        if file_analysis['videos'] and not model_config.get('supports_video'):
            return False, f"æ¨¡å‹ {model_config['name']} ä¸æ”¯æŒè§†é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶"
        
        if file_analysis['audios'] and not model_config.get('supports_audio'):
            return False, f"æ¨¡å‹ {model_config['name']} ä¸æ”¯æŒéŸ³é¢‘æ–‡ä»¶"
        
        if file_analysis['documents'] and not model_config.get('supports_document'):
            return False, f"æ¨¡å‹ {model_config['name']} ä¸æ”¯æŒæ–‡æ¡£æ–‡ä»¶"
        
        if file_analysis['unknown']:
            return False, f"æ¨¡å‹ {model_config['name']} ä¸æ”¯æŒæœªçŸ¥ç±»å‹æ–‡ä»¶: {file_analysis['unknown']}"
        
        return True, ""
    
    def _should_handle_as_document(self, text: str, model_config: Dict) -> Tuple[bool, Optional[str]]:
        """
        åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦åº”è¯¥å°†é•¿æ–‡æœ¬è½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ–‡æ¡£å¤„ç†
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            model_config: æ¨¡å‹é…ç½®
            
        Returns:
            (æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦è½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ–‡æ¡£, æ–‡æ¡£è·¯å¾„)
        """
        if (len(text) > model_config['context_length'] and 
            model_config.get('supports_document') and 
            len(text) <= model_config.get('max_doc_chars', 0)):
            
            doc_path = FileProcessor.text_to_temp_document(text, model_config.get('max_doc_chars'))
            self._add_temp_file(doc_path)
            return True, doc_path
        return False, None
    
    async def _try_qwen(self, text: str, file_paths: Optional[List[str]] = None, stream: bool = False) -> Union[str, AsyncGenerator]:
        """
        å°è¯•ä½¿ç”¨QWENæ¨¡å‹
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            file_paths: æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„åˆ—è¡¨
            stream: æ˜¯å¦æµå¼è¾“å‡º
            
        Returns:
            æ¨¡å‹å“åº”æˆ–å¼‚æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
        """
        config = ModelConfig.QWEN
        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦è½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ–‡æ¡£
        should_doc, doc_path = self._should_handle_as_document(text, config)
        if should_doc:
            file_paths = [doc_path] if not file_paths else (file_paths + [doc_path])
        else:
            text = self._truncate_text(text, config['context_length'])
        
        try:
            if stream:
                result = quick_stream(text, file_paths)
                return self.timeout_manager.wait_for_first_token(result)
            else:
                result = await quick_chat(text, file_paths)
                return result
        except Exception as e:
            raise e
    
    async def _try_openrouter(self, text: str, file_paths: Optional[List[str]] = None, stream: bool = False) -> Union[str, AsyncGenerator]:
        """
        å°è¯•ä½¿ç”¨OPENROUTERæ¨¡å‹
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            file_paths: æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆä»…æ”¯æŒå•ä¸ªå›¾ç‰‡ï¼‰
            stream: æ˜¯å¦æµå¼è¾“å‡º
            
        Returns:
            æ¨¡å‹å“åº”æˆ–å¼‚æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
        """
        config = ModelConfig.OPENROUTER
        text = self._truncate_text(text, config['context_length'])
        
        # OPENROUTERåªæ”¯æŒå•ä¸ªå›¾ç‰‡
        image_path = ""
        if file_paths:
            file_analysis = FileProcessor.analyze_files(file_paths)
            if file_analysis['images']:
                image_path = file_analysis['images'][0]  # åªå–ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå›¾ç‰‡
        
        try:
            if stream:
                result = openrouter_stream(text, image_path)
                return self.timeout_manager.wait_for_first_token(result)
            else:
                result = await openrouter_chat(text, image_path)
                return result
        except Exception as e:
            raise e
    
    async def _try_cerebras(self, text: str, stream: bool = False) -> Union[str, AsyncGenerator]:
        """
        å°è¯•ä½¿ç”¨CEREBRASæ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆä»…æ”¯æŒæ–‡æœ¬ï¼‰
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            stream: æ˜¯å¦æµå¼è¾“å‡º
            
        Returns:
            æ¨¡å‹å“åº”æˆ–å¼‚æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
        """
        config = ModelConfig.CEREBRAS
        text = self._truncate_text(text, config['context_length'])
        
        if stream:
            result = cerebras_stream(text)
            return self.timeout_manager.wait_for_first_token(result)
        else:
            return await cerebras_chat(text)
    
    async def _try_chutes(self, text: str, stream: bool = False) -> Union[str, AsyncGenerator]:
        """
        å°è¯•ä½¿ç”¨CHUTESæ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆä»…æ”¯æŒæ–‡æœ¬ï¼‰
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            stream: æ˜¯å¦æµå¼è¾“å‡º
            
        Returns:
            æ¨¡å‹å“åº”æˆ–å¼‚æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
        """
        config = ModelConfig.CHUTES
        text = self._truncate_text(text, config['context_length'])
        
        if stream:
            result = chutes_stream(text)
            return self.timeout_manager.wait_for_first_token(result)
        else:
            return await chutes_chat(text)
    
    async def _try_minimax(self, text: str, file_paths: Optional[List[str]] = None, stream: bool = False) -> Union[str, AsyncGenerator]:
        """
        å°è¯•ä½¿ç”¨MINIMAXæ¨¡å‹
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            file_paths: æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„åˆ—è¡¨ï¼ˆä»…æ”¯æŒå•ä¸ªå›¾ç‰‡ï¼‰
            stream: æ˜¯å¦æµå¼è¾“å‡º
            
        Returns:
            æ¨¡å‹å“åº”æˆ–å¼‚æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
        """
        config = ModelConfig.MINIMAX
        text = self._truncate_text(text, config['context_length'])
        
        # MINIMAXåªæ”¯æŒå•ä¸ªå›¾ç‰‡
        image_path = None
        if file_paths:
            file_analysis = FileProcessor.analyze_files(file_paths)
            if file_analysis['images']:
                image_path = file_analysis['images'][0]  # åªå–ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå›¾ç‰‡
        
        if stream:
            result = minimax_stream(text, image_path)
            return self.timeout_manager.wait_for_first_token(result)
        else:
            return await minimax_chat(text, image_path)
    
    async def _try_ollama(self, text: str, stream: bool = False) -> Union[str, AsyncGenerator]:
        """
        å°è¯•ä½¿ç”¨OLLAMAæ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆä»…æ”¯æŒæ–‡æœ¬ï¼‰
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            stream: æ˜¯å¦æµå¼è¾“å‡º
            
        Returns:
            æ¨¡å‹å“åº”æˆ–å¼‚æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
        """
        config = ModelConfig.OLLAMA
        text = self._truncate_text(text, config['context_length'])
        
        client = self._get_ollama_client()
        
        if stream:
            result = client.chat_stream(text)
            return self.timeout_manager.wait_for_first_token(result)
        else:
            return await client.chat(text)
    
    async def _try_suanli(self, text: str, stream: bool = False) -> Union[str, AsyncGenerator]:
        """
        å°è¯•ä½¿ç”¨SUANLIæ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆä»…æ”¯æŒæ–‡æœ¬ï¼‰
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            stream: æ˜¯å¦æµå¼è¾“å‡º
            
        Returns:
            æ¨¡å‹å“åº”æˆ–å¼‚æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
        """
        config = ModelConfig.SUANLI
        text = self._truncate_text(text, config['context_length'])
        
        client = self._get_suanli_client()
        
        if stream:
            async def suanli_stream_generator():
                for chunk in client.chat_stream_generator(text, show_stats=False):
                    if not chunk.startswith("âŒ"):
                        yield chunk
            
            result = suanli_stream_generator()
            return self.timeout_manager.wait_for_first_token(result)
        else:
            result, _ = client.chat(text, show_stats=False)
            if result is None:
                raise Exception("Suanliè¿”å›None")
            return result
    
    async def _execute_with_fallback(self, text: str, file_paths: Optional[List[str]] = None, stream: bool = False, retries: int = 0) -> Union[str, AsyncGenerator]:
        """
        æ‰§è¡Œå¸¦å›é€€é€»è¾‘çš„æ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            file_paths: æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„åˆ—è¡¨
            stream: æ˜¯å¦æµå¼è¾“å‡º
            retries: é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°
            
        Returns:
            æ¨¡å‹å“åº”æˆ–å¼‚æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
            
        Raises:
            Exception: æ‰€æœ‰æ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥
        """
        async with self.chat_semaphore:
            self.stats['total_requests'] += 1
            
            # å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶URL
            processed_files = []
            if file_paths:
                try:
                    processed_files = file_paths
                except Exception as e:
                    raise Exception(f"æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
            
            for attempt in range(retries + 1):
                last_error = None
                
                for config in ModelConfig.FALLBACK_ORDER:
                    # éªŒè¯æ¨¡å‹æ˜¯å¦èƒ½å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶
                    can_handle, error_msg = self._validate_files_for_model(config, processed_files)
                    if not can_handle:
                        if config['name'] == 'QWEN':
                            # å¦‚æœè¿QWENéƒ½ä¸èƒ½å¤„ç†ï¼Œç›´æ¥è¿”å›é”™è¯¯
                            self.stats['multimodal_rejections'] += 1
                            raise Exception(error_msg)
                        continue
                    
                    try:
                        if config['name'] == 'QWEN':
                            result = await self._try_qwen(text, processed_files, stream)
                        elif config['name'] == 'OPENROUTER':
                            result = await self._try_openrouter(text, processed_files, stream)
                        elif config['name'] == 'CEREBRAS':
                            result = await self._try_cerebras(text, stream)
                        elif config['name'] == 'CHUTES':
                            result = await self._try_chutes(text, stream)
                        elif config['name'] == 'MINIMAX':
                            result = await self._try_minimax(text, processed_files, stream)
                        elif config['name'] == 'OLLAMA':
                            result = await self._try_ollama(text, stream)
                        elif config['name'] == 'SUANLI':
                            result = await self._try_suanli(text, stream)
                        
                        self.stats['successful_requests'] += 1
                        self.stats['model_usage'][config['name']] += 1
                        return result
                        
                    except Exception as e:
                        last_error = e
                        if _IS_MAIN_MODULE:  # åªåœ¨ä¸»ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œæ—¶è¾“å‡ºè­¦å‘Šæ—¥å¿—
                            logger.warning(f"æ¨¡å‹ {config['name']} è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥ (å°è¯• {attempt + 1}): {str(e)}")
                        continue
                
                # å¦‚æœä¸æ˜¯æœ€åä¸€æ¬¡å°è¯•ï¼Œç­‰å¾…ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´å†é‡è¯•
                if attempt < retries:
                    await asyncio.sleep(1)
            
            # æ‰€æœ‰æ¨¡å‹å’Œé‡è¯•éƒ½å¤±è´¥äº†
            self.stats['fallback_usage'] += 1
            error_message = f"æ‰€æœ‰æ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥ï¼Œæœ€åä¸€ä¸ªé”™è¯¯: {str(last_error)}" if last_error else "æ‰€æœ‰æ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥"
            raise Exception(error_message)
    
    async def chat_with_specific_model(self, model_name: str, text: str, file_paths: Optional[List[str]] = None, stream: bool = False, retries: int = 0) -> Union[str, AsyncGenerator]:
        """
        è°ƒç”¨æŒ‡å®šçš„æ¨¡å‹ï¼ˆä¸ä½¿ç”¨å›é€€æœºåˆ¶ï¼‰
        
        Args:
            model_name: æ¨¡å‹åç§°
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            file_paths: æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„åˆ—è¡¨
            stream: æ˜¯å¦æµå¼è¾“å‡º
            retries: é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°
            
        Returns:
            æ¨¡å‹å“åº”æˆ–å¼‚æ­¥ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
            
        Raises:
            Exception: æ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥æˆ–ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„æ¨¡å‹
        """
        async with self.chat_semaphore:
            self.stats['total_requests'] += 1
            self.stats['direct_model_calls'] += 1
            
            model_name = model_name.upper()
            
            # éªŒè¯æ¨¡å‹æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
            model_configs = {config['name']: config for config in ModelConfig.FALLBACK_ORDER}
            if model_name not in model_configs:
                raise Exception(f"ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„æ¨¡å‹: {model_name}")
            
            config = model_configs[model_name]
            
            # éªŒè¯æ–‡ä»¶æ˜¯å¦èƒ½è¢«æ¨¡å‹å¤„ç†
            can_handle, error_msg = self._validate_files_for_model(config, file_paths or [])
            if not can_handle:
                raise Exception(error_msg)
            
            # å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶
            processed_files = file_paths or []
            
            for attempt in range(retries + 1):
                try:
                    if model_name == 'QWEN':
                        result = await self._try_qwen(text, processed_files, stream)
                    elif model_name == 'OPENROUTER':
                        result = await self._try_openrouter(text, processed_files, stream)
                    elif model_name == 'CEREBRAS':
                        result = await self._try_cerebras(text, stream)
                    elif model_name == 'CHUTES':
                        result = await self._try_chutes(text, stream)
                    elif model_name == 'MINIMAX':
                        result = await self._try_minimax(text, processed_files, stream)
                    elif model_name == 'OLLAMA':
                        result = await self._try_ollama(text, stream)
                    elif model_name == 'SUANLI':
                        result = await self._try_suanli(text, stream)
                    else:
                        raise Exception(f"æœªå®ç°çš„æ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨: {model_name}")
                    
                    self.stats['successful_requests'] += 1
                    self.stats['model_usage'][model_name] += 1
                    return result
                    
                except Exception as e:
                    if attempt < retries:
                        await asyncio.sleep(1)
                        continue
                    raise e
    
    async def chat_with_model_stream(self, text: str, file_paths: Optional[List[str]] = None, retries: int = 0) -> AsyncGenerator[str, None]:
        """
        æµå¼èŠå¤©æ¥å£ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨å›é€€æœºåˆ¶ï¼‰
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            file_paths: æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„åˆ—è¡¨
            retries: é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°
            
        Yields:
            æ¨¡å‹å“åº”çš„æ–‡æœ¬å—
        """
        result = await self._execute_with_fallback(text, file_paths, stream=True, retries=retries)
        async for chunk in result:
            yield chunk
    
    async def chat_with_model(self, text: str, file_paths: Optional[List[str]] = None, retries: int = 0) -> str:
        """
        éæµå¼èŠå¤©æ¥å£ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨å›é€€æœºåˆ¶ï¼‰
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            file_paths: æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„åˆ—è¡¨
            retries: é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°
            
        Returns:
            æ¨¡å‹å“åº”æ–‡æœ¬
        """
        result = await self._execute_with_fallback(text, file_paths, stream=False, retries=retries)
        return result
    
    async def chat_with_tts(self, text: str, voice: str = "æ´¾è’™", save_path: Optional[str] = None, retries: int = 0) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """
        æ–‡æœ¬è½¬è¯­éŸ³æ¥å£
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            voice: è¯­éŸ³ç±»å‹
            save_path: ä¿å­˜è·¯å¾„
            retries: é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°
            
        Returns:
            TTSç»“æœå­—å…¸
        """
        for attempt in range(retries + 1):
            try:
                # åœ¨çº¿ç¨‹æ± ä¸­æ‰§è¡ŒTTSï¼Œé¿å…é˜»å¡å¼‚æ­¥å¾ªç¯
                loop = asyncio.get_event_loop()
                result = await loop.run_in_executor(self.thread_pool, tts, text, voice, save_path)
                return result
            except Exception as e:
                if attempt < retries:
                    await asyncio.sleep(1)
                    continue
                raise e
    
    async def chat_with_embed(self, text: str, retries: int = 0) -> List[float]:
        """
        æ–‡æœ¬åµŒå…¥æ¥å£
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            retries: é‡è¯•æ¬¡æ•°
            
        Returns:
            åµŒå…¥å‘é‡
        """
        async with self.embed_semaphore:
            for attempt in range(retries + 1):
                try:
                    client = self._get_embed_client()
                    # åœ¨çº¿ç¨‹æ± ä¸­æ‰§è¡ŒåµŒå…¥ï¼Œé¿å…é˜»å¡å¼‚æ­¥å¾ªç¯
                    loop = asyncio.get_event_loop()
                    embedding = await loop.run_in_executor(self.thread_pool, client.get_embedding, text)
                    return embedding
                except Exception as e:
                    if attempt < retries:
                        await asyncio.sleep(1)
                        continue
                    raise e
    
    def cleanup_temp_files(self, file_paths: List[str]) -> None:
        """æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶"""
        for file_path in file_paths:
            self._remove_temp_file(file_path)
    
    def get_stats(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
        """
        è·å–ç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯
        
        Returns:
            åŒ…å«å„ç§ç»Ÿè®¡æ•°æ®çš„å­—å…¸
        """
        success_rate = (self.stats['successful_requests'] / max(self.stats['total_requests'], 1)) * 100
        return {
            **self.stats,
            'success_rate': round(success_rate, 2),
            'fallback_rate': round((self.stats['fallback_usage'] / max(self.stats['total_requests'], 1)) * 100, 2),
            'direct_call_rate': round((self.stats['direct_model_calls'] / max(self.stats['total_requests'], 1)) * 100, 2)
        }
    
    async def close(self) -> None:
        """æ¸…ç†èµ„æº"""
        self.thread_pool.shutdown(wait=True)
        
        # æ¸…ç†æ‰€æœ‰ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
        with self._temp_lock:
            for file_path in list(self.temp_files):
                self._remove_temp_file(file_path)
            
            # åˆ é™¤ä¸´æ—¶ç›®å½•
            try:
                os.rmdir(self.temp_dir)
            except:
                pass
        
        try:
            await qwen_cleanup()
        except:
            pass

# å…¨å±€å¤„ç†å™¨å®ä¾‹
_global_handler = None
_handler_lock = threading.Lock()

def get_handler() -> ClientHandler:
    """è·å–å…¨å±€å¤„ç†å™¨å®ä¾‹ï¼ˆå•ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼ï¼‰"""
    global _global_handler
    if _global_handler is None:
        with _handler_lock:
            if _global_handler is None:
                _global_handler = ClientHandler()
    return _global_handler

def create_error_response(error_type: str, message: str, code: int = 500) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """åˆ›å»ºæ ‡å‡†é”™è¯¯å“åº”"""
    return {
        "error": {
            "type": error_type,
            "message": message,
            "code": code
        }
    }

def create_openai_response(content: str, model: str, usage: dict = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """åˆ›å»ºOpenAIæ ¼å¼çš„å“åº”"""
    return {
        "id": f"chatcmpl-{uuid.uuid4().hex}",
        "object": "chat.completion",
        "created": int(time.time()),
        "model": model,
        "choices": [{
            "index": 0,
            "message": {
                "role": "assistant",
                "content": content
            },
            "finish_reason": "stop"
        }],
        "usage": usage or {
            "prompt_tokens": 0,
            "completion_tokens": 0,
            "total_tokens": 0
        }
    }

def create_anthropic_response(content: str, model: str, usage: dict = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    """åˆ›å»ºAnthropicæ ¼å¼çš„å“åº”"""
    return {
        "id": f"msg_{uuid.uuid4().hex}",
        "type": "message",
        "role": "assistant",
        "content": [
            {
                "type": "text",
                "text": content
            }
        ],
        "model": model,
        "stop_reason": "end_turn",
        "stop_sequence": None,
        "usage": usage or {
            "input_tokens": 0,
            "output_tokens": 0
        }
    }

async def create_openai_stream_response(content_generator: AsyncGenerator, model: str):
    """åˆ›å»ºOpenAIæ ¼å¼çš„æµå¼å“åº”"""
    # é¦–å…ˆå‘é€å¼€å§‹æ ‡è®°
    yield f"data: {json.dumps({'id': f'chatcmpl-{uuid.uuid4().hex}', 'object': 'chat.completion.chunk', 'created': int(time.time()), 'model': model, 'choices': [{'index': 0, 'delta': {'role': 'assistant'}, 'finish_reason': None}]})}\n\n"
    
    # å‘é€å†…å®¹
    async for chunk in content_generator:
        if chunk:
            yield f"data: {json.dumps({'id': f'chatcmpl-{uuid.uuid4().hex}', 'object': 'chat.completion.chunk', 'created': int(time.time()), 'model': model, 'choices': [{'index': 0, 'delta': {'content': chunk}, 'finish_reason': None}]})}\n\n"
    
    # å‘é€ç»“æŸæ ‡è®°
    yield f"data: {json.dumps({'id': f'chatcmpl-{uuid.uuid4().hex}', 'object': 'chat.completion.chunk', 'created': int(time.time()), 'model': model, 'choices': [{'index': 0, 'delta': {}, 'finish_reason': 'stop'}]})}\n\n"
    yield "data: [DONE]\n\n"

async def create_anthropic_stream_response(content_generator: AsyncGenerator, model: str):
    """åˆ›å»ºAnthropicæ ¼å¼çš„æµå¼å“åº”"""
    message_id = f"msg_{uuid.uuid4().hex}"
    
    # å‘é€å¼€å§‹äº‹ä»¶
    yield f"event: message_start\ndata: {json.dumps({'type': 'message_start', 'message': {'id': message_id, 'type': 'message', 'role': 'assistant', 'content': [], 'model': model, 'stop_reason': None, 'stop_sequence': None, 'usage': {'input_tokens': 0, 'output_tokens': 0}}})}\n\n"
    
    # å‘é€å†…å®¹å¼€å§‹äº‹ä»¶
    yield f"event: content_block_start\ndata: {json.dumps({'type': 'content_block_start', 'index': 0, 'content_block': {'type': 'text', 'text': ''}})}\n\n"
    
    # å‘é€å†…å®¹å¢é‡
    async for chunk in content_generator:
        if chunk:
            yield f"event: content_block_delta\ndata: {json.dumps({'type': 'content_block_delta', 'index': 0, 'delta': {'type': 'text_delta', 'text': chunk}})}\n\n"
    
    # å‘é€ç»“æŸäº‹ä»¶
    yield f"event: content_block_stop\ndata: {json.dumps({'type': 'content_block_stop', 'index': 0})}\n\n"
    yield f"event: message_delta\ndata: {json.dumps({'type': 'message_delta', 'delta': {'stop_reason': 'end_turn', 'stop_sequence': None}, 'usage': {'output_tokens': 0}})}\n\n"
    yield f"event: message_stop\ndata: {json.dumps({'type': 'message_stop'})}\n\n"

def extract_text_from_messages(messages: List[Dict], format_type: str = "openai") -> str:
    """ä»æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­æå–æ–‡æœ¬å†…å®¹"""
    text_content = ""
    
    if format_type == "openai":
        for message in messages:
            role = message.get('role', 'user')
            content = message.get('content', '')
            if isinstance(content, str):
                text_content += f"{role}: {content}\n"
            elif isinstance(content, list):
                # å¤„ç†å¤šæ¨¡æ€å†…å®¹
                for item in content:
                    if item.get('type') == 'text':
                        text_content += f"{role}: {item.get('text', '')}\n"
    
    elif format_type == "anthropic":
        for message in messages:
            role = message.get('role', 'user')
            content = message.get('content', '')
            if isinstance(content, str):
                text_content += f"{role}: {content}\n"
            elif isinstance(content, list):
                # å¤„ç†å¤šæ¨¡æ€å†…å®¹
                for item in content:
                    if item.get('type') == 'text':
                        text_content += f"{role}: {item.get('text', '')}\n"
    
    return text_content

def extract_files_from_messages(messages: List[Dict], format_type: str = "openai") -> List[str]:
    """ä»æ¶ˆæ¯åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­æå–æ–‡ä»¶URL"""
    file_urls = []
    
    if format_type == "openai":
        for message in messages:
            content = message.get('content', [])
            if isinstance(content, list):
                for item in content:
                    # æ”¯æŒfile_urlæ ¼å¼ (æ–°å¢)
                    if item.get('type') == 'file_url':
                        file_url = item.get('file_url', {}).get('url')
                        if file_url:
                            file_urls.append(file_url)
                    # å…¼å®¹åŸæœ‰çš„image_urlæ ¼å¼
                    elif item.get('type') == 'image_url':
                        image_url = item.get('image_url', {}).get('url')
                        if image_url:
                            file_urls.append(image_url)
    
    elif format_type == "anthropic":
        for message in messages:
            content = message.get('content', [])
            if isinstance(content, list):
                for item in content:
                    item_type = item.get('type')
                    
                    # å¤„ç†å„ç§æ–‡ä»¶ç±»å‹
                    if item_type in ['image', 'video', 'audio', 'document']:
                        source = item.get('source', {})
                        if source.get('type') == 'url':
                            # ç›´æ¥URL
                            url = source.get('url')
                            if url:
                                file_urls.append(url)
                        elif source.get('type') == 'base64':
                            # å¤„ç†base64æ•°æ®ï¼Œè½¬æ¢ä¸ºä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
                            media_type = source.get('media_type', '')
                            data = source.get('data', '')
                            if data:
                                # æ ¹æ®media_typeç¡®å®šæ–‡ä»¶æ‰©å±•å
                                if 'image' in media_type:
                                    ext = media_type.split('/')[-1] if '/' in media_type else 'jpg'
                                elif 'video' in media_type:
                                    ext = media_type.split('/')[-1] if '/' in media_type else 'mp4'
                                elif 'audio' in media_type:
                                    ext = media_type.split('/')[-1] if '/' in media_type else 'mp3'
                                elif 'pdf' in media_type:
                                    ext = 'pdf'
                                else:
                                    ext = 'bin'
                                
                                temp_path = os.path.join(tempfile.gettempdir(), f"{uuid.uuid4().hex}.{ext}")
                                try:
                                    with open(temp_path, 'wb') as f:
                                        f.write(base64.b64decode(data))
                                    file_urls.append(temp_path)
                                except Exception as e:
                                    if _IS_MAIN_MODULE:  # åªåœ¨ä¸»ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œæ—¶è¾“å‡ºè­¦å‘Š
                                        logger.warning(f"å¤„ç†base64æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}")
    
    return file_urls

@app.route('/v1/chat/completions', methods=['POST'])
async def chat_completions():
    """OpenAIå…¼å®¹çš„èŠå¤©å®ŒæˆAPI - æ”¯æŒå¤šæ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨å’Œæ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†"""
    temp_files = []
    try:
        data = await request.get_json()
        # éªŒè¯å¿…éœ€å‚æ•°
        if not data or 'messages' not in data:
            return jsonify(create_error_response("invalid_request", "ç¼ºå°‘messageså‚æ•°", 400)), 400
        
        model = data.get('model', 'auto_chat')
        messages = data.get('messages', [])
        stream = data.get('stream', False)
        
        # å¤„ç†optionså‚æ•°
        options = data.get('options', {})
        retries = options.get('retries', 0)
        
        # ç»„åˆæ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹
        text_content = extract_text_from_messages(messages, "openai")
        
        if not text_content.strip():
            return jsonify(create_error_response("invalid_request", "æ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹ä¸ºç©º", 400)), 400
        
        handler = get_handler()
        
        # å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
        file_urls = []
        form = await request.files
        if form:
            for file_key in form:
                file = form[file_key]
                if file.filename:
                    # ä¿å­˜ä¸Šä¼ çš„æ–‡ä»¶
                    file_path = os.path.join(handler.temp_dir, f"{uuid.uuid4().hex}_{file.filename}")
                    await file.save(file_path)
                    handler._add_temp_file(file_path)
                    file_urls.append(file_path)
                    temp_files.append(file_path)
        
        # ä»æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸­æå–æ–‡ä»¶URL
        message_files = extract_files_from_messages(messages, "openai")
        file_urls.extend(message_files)
        temp_files.extend([f for f in message_files if not f.startswith(('http://', 'https://'))])
        
        # è·å–æ¨¡å‹é…ç½®
        model_configs = {config['name']: config for config in ModelConfig.FALLBACK_ORDER}
        model_upper = model.upper()
        
        try:
            if model_upper in model_configs:
                # ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨æŒ‡å®šæ¨¡å‹
                if stream:
                    async def generate():
                        try:
                            async for chunk in create_openai_stream_response(
                                handler.chat_with_specific_model(model_upper, text_content, file_urls or None, True, retries), 
                                model
                            ):
                                yield chunk
                        except Exception as e:
                            error_chunk = f"data: {json.dumps(create_error_response('api_error', str(e)))}\n\n"
                            yield error_chunk
                            yield "data: [DONE]\n\n"
                        finally:
                            # æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
                            handler.cleanup_temp_files(temp_files)
                    
                    return Response(generate(), mimetype='text/plain')
                else:
                    content = await handler.chat_with_specific_model(model_upper, text_content, file_urls or None, False, retries)
                    return jsonify(create_openai_response(content, model))
            
            elif model in ['auto_chat', 'gpt-4', 'gpt-4.1'] or model.startswith("claude"):
                # ä½¿ç”¨å›é€€æœºåˆ¶
                if stream:
                    async def generate():
                        try:
                            async for chunk in create_openai_stream_response(
                                handler.chat_with_model_stream(text_content, file_urls or None, retries), 
                                model
                            ):
                                yield chunk
                        except Exception as e:
                            error_chunk = f"data: {json.dumps(create_error_response('api_error', str(e)))}\n\n"
                            yield error_chunk
                            yield "data: [DONE]\n\n"
                        finally:
                            # æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
                            handler.cleanup_temp_files(temp_files)
                    
                    return Response(generate(), mimetype='text/plain')
                else:
                    content = await handler.chat_with_model(text_content, file_urls or None, retries)
                    return jsonify(create_openai_response(content, model))
            
            elif model == 'auto_tts':
                try:
                    voice = data.get('voice', 'æ´¾è’™')
                    result = await handler.chat_with_tts(text_content, voice, retries=retries)
                    return jsonify(result)
                except Exception as e:
                    return jsonify(create_error_response("tts_error", str(e), 500)), 500
            
            elif model == 'auto_embedding':
                try:
                    embedding = await handler.chat_with_embed(text_content, retries=retries)
                    return jsonify({
                        "object": "list",
                        "data": [{
                            "object": "embedding",
                            "embedding": embedding,
                            "index": 0
                        }],
                        "model": model,
                        "usage": {
                            "prompt_tokens": len(text_content.split()),
                            "total_tokens": len(text_content.split())
                        }
                    })
                except Exception as e:
                    return jsonify(create_error_response("embedding_error", str(e), 500)), 500
            
            else:
                return jsonify(create_error_response("invalid_model", f"ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„æ¨¡å‹: {model}", 400)), 400
        
        except Exception as e:
            return jsonify(create_error_response("api_error", str(e), 500)), 500
        finally:
            # æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
            handler.cleanup_temp_files(temp_files)
    
    except Exception as e:
        if _IS_MAIN_MODULE:  # åªåœ¨ä¸»ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œæ—¶è¾“å‡ºé”™è¯¯æ—¥å¿—
            logger.error(f"OpenAI APIè°ƒç”¨å‡ºé”™: {str(e)}")
        return jsonify(create_error_response("internal_error", str(e), 500)), 500

@app.route('/v1/messages', methods=['POST'])
async def anthropic_messages():
    """Anthropicå…¼å®¹çš„æ¶ˆæ¯API - æ”¯æŒå¤šæ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨å’Œæ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†"""
    temp_files = []
    try:
        data = await request.get_json()

        # éªŒè¯å¿…éœ€å‚æ•°
        if not data or 'messages' not in data:
            return jsonify(create_error_response("invalid_request", "ç¼ºå°‘messageså‚æ•°", 400)), 400
        
        model = data.get('model', 'auto_chat')
        messages = data.get('messages', [])
        stream = data.get('stream', False)
        max_tokens = data.get('max_tokens', 1048576)
        
        # å¤„ç†optionså‚æ•°
        options = data.get('options', {})
        retries = options.get('retries', 0)
        
        # ç»„åˆæ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹
        text_content = extract_text_from_messages(messages, "anthropic")
        
        if not text_content.strip():
            return jsonify(create_error_response("invalid_request", "æ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹ä¸ºç©º", 400)), 400
        
        handler = get_handler()
        
        # å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
        file_urls = []
        form = await request.files
        if form:
            for file_key in form:
                file = form[file_key]
                if file.filename:
                    # ä¿å­˜ä¸Šä¼ çš„æ–‡ä»¶
                    file_path = os.path.join(handler.temp_dir, f"{uuid.uuid4().hex}_{file.filename}")
                    await file.save(file_path)
                    handler._add_temp_file(file_path)
                    file_urls.append(file_path)
                    temp_files.append(file_path)
        
        # ä»æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸­æå–æ–‡ä»¶
        message_files = extract_files_from_messages(messages, "anthropic")
        file_urls.extend(message_files)
        temp_files.extend([f for f in message_files if not f.startswith(('http://', 'https://'))])
        
        # è·å–æ¨¡å‹é…ç½®
        model_configs = {config['name']: config for config in ModelConfig.FALLBACK_ORDER}
        model_upper = model.upper()
        
        try:
            if model_upper in model_configs:
                # ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨æŒ‡å®šæ¨¡å‹
                if stream:
                    async def generate():
                        try:
                            async for chunk in create_anthropic_stream_response(
                                handler.chat_with_specific_model(model_upper, text_content, file_urls or None, True, retries), 
                                model
                            ):
                                yield chunk
                        except Exception as e:
                            error_chunk = f"event: error\ndata: {json.dumps(create_error_response('api_error', str(e)))}\n\n"
                            yield error_chunk
                        finally:
                            # æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
                            handler.cleanup_temp_files(temp_files)
                    
                    return Response(generate(), mimetype='text/plain')
                else:
                    content = await handler.chat_with_specific_model(model_upper, text_content, file_urls or None, False, retries)
                    return jsonify(create_anthropic_response(content, model))
            
            elif model.startswith("claude") or model == "auto_chat":
                # ä½¿ç”¨å›é€€æœºåˆ¶
                if stream:
                    async def generate():
                        try:
                            async for chunk in create_anthropic_stream_response(
                                handler.chat_with_model_stream(text_content, file_urls or None, retries), 
                                model
                            ):
                                yield chunk
                        except Exception as e:
                            error_chunk = f"event: error\ndata: {json.dumps(create_error_response('api_error', str(e)))}\n\n"
                            yield error_chunk
                        finally:
                            # æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
                            handler.cleanup_temp_files(temp_files)
                    
                    return Response(generate(), mimetype='text/plain')
                else:
                    content = await handler.chat_with_model(text_content, file_urls or None, retries)
                    return jsonify(create_anthropic_response(content, model))
            
            else:
                return jsonify(create_error_response("invalid_model", f"ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„æ¨¡å‹: {model}", 400)), 400
        
        except Exception as e:
            return jsonify(create_error_response("api_error", str(e), 500)), 500
        finally:
            # æ¸…ç†ä¸´æ—¶æ–‡ä»¶
            handler.cleanup_temp_files(temp_files)
    
    except Exception as e:
        if _IS_MAIN_MODULE:  # åªåœ¨ä¸»ç¨‹åºè¿è¡Œæ—¶è¾“å‡ºé”™è¯¯æ—¥å¿—
            logger.error(f"Anthropic APIè°ƒç”¨å‡ºé”™: {str(e)}")
        return jsonify(create_error_response("internal_error", str(e), 500)), 500

        },

            "id": "gpt-4",
            "object": "model",
            "created": int(time.time()),
            "owned_by": "nbot",
            "permission": [],
            "root": "auto_chat",
            "parent": None,
        },
        {
            "id": "gpt-4.1",
            "object": "model",
            "created": int(time.time()),
            "owned_by": "nbot",
            "permission": [],
            "root": "auto_chat",
            "parent": None,
        },
        {
            "id": "auto_tts",
            "object": "model", 
            "created": int(time.time()),
            "owned_by": "nbot",
            "permission": [],
            "root": "auto_tts",
            "parent": None,
        },
        {
            "id": "auto_embedding",
            "object": "model",
            "created": int(time.time()),
            "owned_by": "nbot", 
            "permission": [],
            "root": "auto_embedding",
            "parent": None,
        }
    ]
    
    return jsonify({
        "object": "list",
        "data": models
    })

@app.route('/v1/health', methods=['GET'])
async def health_check():
    """å¥åº·æ£€æŸ¥å’Œç»Ÿè®¡ä¿¡æ¯"""
    handler = get_handler()
    stats = handler.get_stats()
    return jsonify({
        "status": "healthy",
        "timestamp": int(time.time()),
        "stats": stats
    })

    """æ ¹è·¯å¾„ - APIæ–‡æ¡£å’ŒåŠŸèƒ½ä»‹ç»"""

@app.errorhandler(404)
async def not_found(error):
    return jsonify(create_error_response("not_found", "æ¥å£ä¸å­˜åœ¨", 404)), 404

@app.errorhandler(500)
async def internal_error(error):
    return jsonify(create_error_response("internal_error", "æœåŠ¡å™¨å†…éƒ¨é”™è¯¯", 500)), 500

if __name__ == '__main__':
    app.run(host='0.0.0.0', port=8000, debug=False)


--------------------------------------------------

# client\embed_client.py
# embed_client.py
import os
import time
import subprocess
import requests
import json
from typing import List, Optional, Dict, Any

# å…¨å±€å˜é‡ç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨ollamaè¿›ç¨‹
global_ollama_process = None

class EmbedClient:
    def __init__(self, model: str = 'mxbai-embed-large:latest', base_url: str = "http://localhost:11434"):
        """
        åˆå§‹åŒ–åµŒå…¥å‘é‡å®¢æˆ·ç«¯
        
        Args:
            model: ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ¨¡å‹åç§°ï¼Œé»˜è®¤ä¸º 'mxbai-embed-large'
            base_url: OllamaæœåŠ¡çš„åŸºç¡€URL
        """
        self.model = model
        self.base_url = base_url
        
        # å¯åŠ¨ollamaæœåŠ¡
        print(self.start_ollama_service())
    
    def start_ollama_service(self, ollama_path: str = r"E:\Users\dell\AppData\Local\Programs\Programs\Ollama\ollama.exe", timeout: int = 10) -> str:
        """å¯åŠ¨ Ollama æœåŠ¡"""
        global global_ollama_process

        if not os.path.exists(ollama_path):
            return f"Ollamaå¯æ‰§è¡Œæ–‡ä»¶æœªæ‰¾åˆ°: {ollama_path}"

        try:
            global_ollama_process = subprocess.Popen(
                [ollama_path],
                shell=True,
                creationflags=subprocess.CREATE_NO_WINDOW,
            )
        
            start_time = time.time()
            while time.time() - start_time < timeout:
                try:
                    response = requests.get(f"{self.base_url}/api/tags", timeout=2)
                    if response.status_code == 200:
                        return "OllamaæœåŠ¡å¯åŠ¨æˆåŠŸ"
                except requests.exceptions.RequestException:
                    time.sleep(1)
    
            return f"æœåŠ¡å¯åŠ¨è¶…æ—¶({timeout}ç§’)ï¼Œè¯·æ‰‹åŠ¨æ£€æŸ¥"
    
        except Exception as e:
            return f"æœåŠ¡å¯åŠ¨å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}"
    
    def get_embedding(self, text: str) -> List[float]:
        """
        è·å–å•ä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬çš„åµŒå…¥å‘é‡
        
        Args:
            text: è¾“å…¥æ–‡æœ¬
            
        Returns:
            åµŒå…¥å‘é‡åˆ—è¡¨
        """
        try:
            url = f"{self.base_url}/api/embeddings"
            payload = {
                "model": self.model,
                "prompt": text
            }
            
            headers = {
                "Content-Type": "application/json"
            }
            
            response = requests.post(url, json=payload, headers=headers, timeout=30)
            response.raise_for_status()
            
            result = response.json()
            return result.get('embedding', [])
            
        except requests.exceptions.RequestException as e:
            print(f"ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯: {e}")
            return []
        except json.JSONDecodeError as e:
            print(f"JSONè§£æé”™è¯¯: {e}")
            return []
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"è·å–åµŒå…¥å‘é‡æ—¶å‡ºé”™: {e}")
            return []
    
    def get_embeddings_batch(self, texts: List[str]) -> List[List[float]]:
        """
        æ‰¹é‡è·å–å¤šä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬çš„åµŒå…¥å‘é‡
        
        Args:
            texts: æ–‡æœ¬åˆ—è¡¨
            
        Returns:
            åµŒå…¥å‘é‡åˆ—è¡¨çš„åˆ—è¡¨
        """
        embeddings = []
        for text in texts:
            embedding = self.get_embedding(text)
            embeddings.append(embedding)
            # æ·»åŠ å°å»¶è¿Ÿé¿å…è¿‡å¿«è¯·æ±‚
            time.sleep(0.1)
        return embeddings
    
    def similarity(self, text1: str, text2: str) -> float:
        """
        è®¡ç®—ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬çš„ä½™å¼¦ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦
        
        Args:
            text1: ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬
            text2: ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬
            
        Returns:
            ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦åˆ†æ•° (0-1ä¹‹é—´)
        """
        try:
            import numpy as np
            
            embedding1 = self.get_embedding(text1)
            embedding2 = self.get_embedding(text2)
            
            if not embedding1 or not embedding2:
                return 0.0
            
            # è®¡ç®—ä½™å¼¦ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦
            vec1 = np.array(embedding1)
            vec2 = np.array(embedding2)
            
            # é¿å…é™¤é›¶é”™è¯¯
            norm1 = np.linalg.norm(vec1)
            norm2 = np.linalg.norm(vec2)
            
            if norm1 == 0 or norm2 == 0:
                return 0.0
            
            cosine_sim = np.dot(vec1, vec2) / (norm1 * norm2)
            return float(cosine_sim)
        
        except ImportError:
            print("éœ€è¦å®‰è£… numpy: pip install numpy")
            return 0.0
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"è®¡ç®—ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦æ—¶å‡ºé”™: {e}")
            return 0.0
    
    def similarity_without_numpy(self, text1: str, text2: str) -> float:
        """
        ä¸ä½¿ç”¨numpyè®¡ç®—ä¸¤ä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬çš„ä½™å¼¦ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦
        
        Args:
            text1: ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬
            text2: ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬
            
        Returns:
            ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦åˆ†æ•° (0-1ä¹‹é—´)
        """
        try:
            embedding1 = self.get_embedding(text1)
            embedding2 = self.get_embedding(text2)
            
            if not embedding1 or not embedding2 or len(embedding1) != len(embedding2):
                return 0.0
            
            # æ‰‹åŠ¨è®¡ç®—ä½™å¼¦ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦
            dot_product = sum(a * b for a, b in zip(embedding1, embedding2))
            norm1 = sum(a * a for a in embedding1) ** 0.5
            norm2 = sum(b * b for b in embedding2) ** 0.5
            
            if norm1 == 0 or norm2 == 0:
                return 0.0
            
            cosine_sim = dot_product / (norm1 * norm2)
            return float(cosine_sim)
        
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"è®¡ç®—ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦æ—¶å‡ºé”™: {e}")
            return 0.0
    
    def check_service_status(self) -> bool:
        """æ£€æŸ¥OllamaæœåŠ¡çŠ¶æ€"""
        try:
            response = requests.get(f"{self.base_url}/api/tags", timeout=5)
            return response.status_code == 200
        except Exception:
            return False
    
    def list_models(self) -> List[str]:
        """åˆ—å‡ºå¯ç”¨çš„æ¨¡å‹"""
        try:
            response = requests.get(f"{self.base_url}/api/tags", timeout=10)
            response.raise_for_status()
            
            result = response.json()
            models = []
            for model in result.get('models', []):
                models.append(model.get('name', ''))
            return models
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"è·å–æ¨¡å‹åˆ—è¡¨æ—¶å‡ºé”™: {e}")
            return []

# ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
if __name__ == "__main__":
    # åˆ›å»ºå®¢æˆ·ç«¯
    client = EmbedClient()
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥æœåŠ¡çŠ¶æ€
    if not client.check_service_status():
        print("OllamaæœåŠ¡æœªå¯åŠ¨ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥")
        exit()
    
    # åˆ—å‡ºå¯ç”¨æ¨¡å‹
    models = client.list_models()
    print(f"å¯ç”¨æ¨¡å‹: {models}")
    
    # è·å–å•ä¸ªåµŒå…¥å‘é‡
    embedding = client.get_embedding("ä½ å¥½")
    print(f"åµŒå…¥å‘é‡ç»´åº¦: {len(embedding)}")
    if embedding:
        print(f"å‰5ä¸ªå‘é‡å€¼: {embedding[:5]}")
    
    # æ‰¹é‡å¤„ç†
    texts = ["ä½ å¥½", "Hello", "å†è§", "Goodbye"]
    embeddings = client.get_embeddings_batch(texts)
    print(f"æ‰¹é‡å¤„ç†äº† {len(embeddings)} ä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬")
    
    # è®¡ç®—ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨numpyç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼‰
    try:
        similarity_score = client.similarity("ä½ å¥½", "Hello")
        print(f"'ä½ å¥½' å’Œ 'Hello' çš„ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦(numpyç‰ˆæœ¬): {similarity_score:.4f}")
    except:
        pass
    
    # è®¡ç®—ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦ï¼ˆä¸ä½¿ç”¨numpyç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼‰
    similarity_score_no_numpy = client.similarity_without_numpy("ä½ å¥½", "Hello")
    print(f"'ä½ å¥½' å’Œ 'Hello' çš„ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦(çº¯Pythonç‰ˆæœ¬): {similarity_score_no_numpy:.4f}")


--------------------------------------------------

# client\minimax_client.py
# integrated_ai_client.py
import requests
import json
import base64
import os
from typing import Generator, AsyncGenerator, Optional
import aiohttp
import asyncio
import aiofiles

# é…ç½®ä¿¡æ¯
BASE_URL = "https://ai.airoe.cn/v1/chat/completions"
API_KEY = "sk-6u1bhYqbHYo9dBFDWtzhRPorRibaFVj87HFJ72za7AQecNYo"
MODEL = "minimax"
TEMPERATURE = 0.7

class AIROEAPIError(Exception):
    """AIROE API ä¸“ç”¨å¼‚å¸¸ç±»"""
    def __init__(self, status_code: int, message: str):
        self.status_code = status_code
        self.message = message
        super().__init__(f"{status_code}: {message}")

def _is_url(path: str) -> bool:
    """åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºURL"""
    return path.startswith(('http://', 'https://'))

def _get_image_type(image_path: str) -> str:
    """æ ¹æ®æ–‡ä»¶æ‰©å±•åæ¨æ–­å›¾ç‰‡ç±»å‹"""
    if image_path.lower().endswith('.png'):
        return 'image/png'
    elif image_path.lower().endswith(('.jpg', '.jpeg')):
        return 'image/jpeg'
    elif image_path.lower().endswith('.gif'):
        return 'image/gif'
    elif image_path.lower().endswith('.webp'):
        return 'image/webp'
    else:
        return 'image/png'  # é»˜è®¤ç±»å‹

async def _process_image_async(image_path: str) -> dict:
    """å¼‚æ­¥å¤„ç†å›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œè¿”å›å›¾ç‰‡æ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹"""
    if _is_url(image_path):
        # URL å›¾ç‰‡
        return {
            "type": "image_url",
            "image_url": {"url": image_path}
        }
    else:
        # æœ¬åœ°å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶
        try:
            async with aiofiles.open(image_path, "rb") as image_file:
                image_data = await image_file.read()
                base64_image = base64.b64encode(image_data).decode('utf-8')
                image_type = _get_image_type(image_path)
                return {
                    "type": "image_url",
                    "image_url": {
                        "url": f"data:{image_type};base64,{base64_image}"
                    }
                }
        except FileNotFoundError:
            raise AIROEAPIError(0, f"æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶: {image_path}")
        except Exception as e:
            raise AIROEAPIError(0, f"è¯»å–å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶æ—¶å‡ºé”™: {e}")

def _process_image_sync(image_path: str) -> dict:
    """åŒæ­¥å¤„ç†å›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œè¿”å›å›¾ç‰‡æ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹"""
    if _is_url(image_path):
        # URL å›¾ç‰‡
        return {
            "type": "image_url",
            "image_url": {"url": image_path}
        }
    else:
        # æœ¬åœ°å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶
        try:
            with open(image_path, "rb") as image_file:
                image_data = image_file.read()
                base64_image = base64.b64encode(image_data).decode('utf-8')
                image_type = _get_image_type(image_path)
                return {
                    "type": "image_url",
                    "image_url": {
                        "url": f"data:{image_type};base64,{base64_image}"
                    }
                }
        except FileNotFoundError:
            raise AIROEAPIError(0, f"æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶: {image_path}")
        except Exception as e:
            raise AIROEAPIError(0, f"è¯»å–å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶æ—¶å‡ºé”™: {e}")

async def _build_message_content_async(question: str, image_path: Optional[str] = None) -> list:
    """å¼‚æ­¥æ„å»ºæ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹"""
    if image_path:
        # åŒ…å«å›¾ç‰‡çš„æ¶ˆæ¯
        content = [
            {"type": "text", "text": question},
            await _process_image_async(image_path)
        ]
    else:
        # çº¯æ–‡æœ¬æ¶ˆæ¯
        content = question
    return content

def _build_message_content_sync(question: str, image_path: Optional[str] = None):
    """åŒæ­¥æ„å»ºæ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹"""
    if image_path:
        # åŒ…å«å›¾ç‰‡çš„æ¶ˆæ¯
        content = [
            {"type": "text", "text": question},
            _process_image_sync(image_path)
        ]
    else:
        # çº¯æ–‡æœ¬æ¶ˆæ¯
        content = question
    return content

async def chat_non_stream(question: str, image_path: Optional[str] = None) -> str:
    """
    éæµå¼è¯·æ±‚ï¼šå‘é€é—®é¢˜å¹¶è¿”å›å®Œæ•´å›å¤æ–‡æœ¬
    
    Args:
        question: ç”¨æˆ·é—®é¢˜
        image_path: å›¾ç‰‡è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæœ¬åœ°è·¯å¾„æˆ–URL
    """
    question = 3 * question
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Authorization": f"Bearer {API_KEY}"
    }

    content = await _build_message_content_async(question, image_path)
    
    payload = {
        "model": MODEL,
        "group": "default",
        "messages": [
            {"role": "user", "content": content}
        ],
        "temperature": TEMPERATURE,
        "stream": False,
        "frequency_penalty": 0,
        "presence_penalty": 0
    }

    async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
        async with session.post(BASE_URL, headers=headers, json=payload) as response:
            # å…ˆè¯»å–å“åº”å†…å®¹
            response_text = await response.text()
            
            # æ£€æŸ¥HTTPçŠ¶æ€ç å¹¶æŠ›å‡ºå¼‚å¸¸
            if response.status == 401:
                raise AIROEAPIError(401, "APIå¯†é’¥æ— æ•ˆæˆ–å·²è¿‡æœŸ")
            elif response.status == 403:
                raise AIROEAPIError(403, "è®¿é—®è¢«æ‹’ç»")
            elif response.status == 404:
                raise AIROEAPIError(404, "APIç«¯ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨")
            elif response.status == 429:
                raise AIROEAPIError(429, "è¯·æ±‚é¢‘ç‡è¶…é™")
            elif response.status >= 500:
                raise AIROEAPIError(response.status, f"æœåŠ¡å™¨é”™è¯¯: {response_text[:200]}")
            elif response.status != 200:
                raise AIROEAPIError(response.status, f"HTTP {response.status}: {response_text[:200]}")
            
            # è§£æJSON
            try:
                data = json.loads(response_text)
            except json.JSONDecodeError:
                raise AIROEAPIError(0, f"JSONè§£æå¤±è´¥: {response_text[:200]}")
            
            # æ£€æŸ¥APIè¿”å›çš„é”™è¯¯
            if "error" in data:
                error_msg = data["error"].get("message", str(data["error"]))
                error_code = data["error"].get("code", "unknown")
                raise AIROEAPIError(response.status, f"{error_code}: {error_msg}")
            
            # æå–æ¨¡å‹å›å¤å†…å®¹
            if "choices" not in data or len(data["choices"]) == 0:
                raise AIROEAPIError(response.status, "APIè¿”å›æ ¼å¼é”™è¯¯ï¼šç¼ºå°‘choiceså­—æ®µ")
            
            content = data["choices"][0]["message"]["content"]
            return content.strip()

async def chat_stream(question: str, image_path: Optional[str] = None) -> AsyncGenerator[str, None]:
    """
    æµå¼è¯·æ±‚ï¼šè¿”å›ç”Ÿæˆå™¨ï¼Œé€æ­¥è¾“å‡ºå›å¤å†…å®¹
    
    Args:
        question: ç”¨æˆ·é—®é¢˜
        image_path: å›¾ç‰‡è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæœ¬åœ°è·¯å¾„æˆ–URL
    """
    question = 3 * question
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Authorization": f"Bearer {API_KEY}"
    }

    content = await _build_message_content_async(question, image_path)
    
    payload = {
        "model": MODEL,
        "group": "default",
        "messages": [
            {"role": "user", "content": content}
        ],
        "temperature": TEMPERATURE,
        "stream": True,
        "frequency_penalty": 0,
        "presence_penalty": 0
    }

    async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
        async with session.post(BASE_URL, headers=headers, json=payload) as response:
            # ç«‹å³æ£€æŸ¥HTTPçŠ¶æ€ç 
            if response.status == 401:
                raise AIROEAPIError(401, "APIå¯†é’¥æ— æ•ˆæˆ–å·²è¿‡æœŸ")
            elif response.status == 403:
                raise AIROEAPIError(403, "è®¿é—®è¢«æ‹’ç»")
            elif response.status == 404:
                raise AIROEAPIError(404, "APIç«¯ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨")
            elif response.status == 429:
                raise AIROEAPIError(429, "è¯·æ±‚é¢‘ç‡è¶…é™")
            elif response.status >= 500:
                error_text = await response.text()
                raise AIROEAPIError(response.status, f"æœåŠ¡å™¨é”™è¯¯: {error_text[:200]}")
            elif response.status != 200:
                error_text = await response.text()
                raise AIROEAPIError(response.status, f"HTTP {response.status}: {error_text[:200]}")
            
            received_any_data = False
            buffer = ""
            
            async for line in response.content:
                if line:
                    received_any_data = True
                    line_str = line.decode("utf-8").strip()
                    buffer += line_str + "\n"
                    # å¤„ç†å¯èƒ½çš„å¤šè¡Œæ•°æ®
                    while "\ndata: " in buffer or buffer.startswith("data: "):
                        if buffer.startswith("data: "):
                            end_index = buffer.find("\n")
                            if end_index == -1:
                                break  # ç­‰å¾…æ›´å¤šæ•°æ®
                            current_line = buffer[:end_index]
                            buffer = buffer[end_index + 1:]
                        else:
                            start_index = buffer.find("\ndata: ")
                            if start_index == -1:
                                break
                            # å¤„ç† data: ä¹‹å‰çš„éƒ¨åˆ†
                            buffer = buffer[start_index + 1:]
                            continue
                        
                        if current_line.startswith("data: "):
                            data_str = current_line[6:]  # å»æ‰ "data: "
                            
                            if data_str.strip() == "[DONE]":
                                return  # æ­£å¸¸ç»“æŸ
                            
                            if data_str.strip():  # å¿½ç•¥ç©ºæ•°æ®
                                try:
                                    data = json.loads(data_str)
                                    
                                    # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰é”™è¯¯
                                    if "error" in data:
                                        error_msg = data["error"].get("message", str(data["error"]))
                                        error_code = data["error"].get("code", "unknown")
                                        raise AIROEAPIError(response.status, f"{error_code}: {error_msg}")
                                    
                                    # æå–å†…å®¹
                                    if "choices" in data and len(data["choices"]) > 0:
                                        delta = data["choices"][0].get("delta", {})
                                        if "content" in delta:
                                            if "undefined" == delta["content"]:
                                                raise AIROEAPIError(response.status, f"undefinedé”™è¯¯")
                                            else:
                                                yield delta["content"]
                                            
                                except json.JSONDecodeError:
                                    # å¿½ç•¥æ— æ³•è§£æçš„è¡Œ
                                    pass
            
            if not received_any_data:
                raise AIROEAPIError(response.status, "æœªæ”¶åˆ°ä»»ä½•æµå¼æ•°æ®")

# åŒæ­¥ç‰ˆæœ¬å‡½æ•°ï¼ˆä¿æŒå…¼å®¹æ€§ï¼‰
def chat_non_stream_sync(question: str, image_path: Optional[str] = None) -> str:
    """
    éæµå¼è¯·æ±‚ï¼ˆåŒæ­¥ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼‰
    
    Args:
        question: ç”¨æˆ·é—®é¢˜
        image_path: å›¾ç‰‡è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæœ¬åœ°è·¯å¾„æˆ–URL
    """
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Authorization": f"Bearer {API_KEY}"
    }

    content = _build_message_content_sync(question, image_path)
    
    payload = {
        "model": MODEL,
        "group": "default",
        "messages": [
            {"role": "user", "content": content}
        ],
        "temperature": TEMPERATURE,
        "stream": False,
        "frequency_penalty": 0,
        "presence_penalty": 0
    }

    response = requests.post(BASE_URL, headers=headers, json=payload)
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥HTTPçŠ¶æ€ç 
    if response.status_code == 401:
        raise AIROEAPIError(401, "APIå¯†é’¥æ— æ•ˆæˆ–å·²è¿‡æœŸ")
    elif response.status_code == 403:
        raise AIROEAPIError(403, "è®¿é—®è¢«æ‹’ç»")
    elif response.status_code == 404:
        raise AIROEAPIError(404, "APIç«¯ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨")
    elif response.status_code == 429:
        raise AIROEAPIError(429, "è¯·æ±‚é¢‘ç‡è¶…é™")
    elif response.status_code >= 500:
        raise AIROEAPIError(response.status_code, f"æœåŠ¡å™¨é”™è¯¯: {response.text[:200]}")
    elif response.status_code != 200:
        raise AIROEAPIError(response.status_code, f"HTTP {response.status_code}: {response.text[:200]}")
    
    data = response.json()
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥APIè¿”å›çš„é”™è¯¯
    if "error" in data:
        error_msg = data["error"].get("message", str(data["error"]))
        error_code = data["error"].get("code", "unknown")
        raise AIROEAPIError(response.status_code, f"{error_code}: {error_msg}")
    
    # æå–æ¨¡å‹å›å¤å†…å®¹
    if "choices" not in data or len(data["choices"]) == 0:
        raise AIROEAPIError(response.status_code, "APIè¿”å›æ ¼å¼é”™è¯¯ï¼šç¼ºå°‘choiceså­—æ®µ")
    
    content = data["choices"][0]["message"]["content"]
    return content.strip()

def chat_stream_sync(question: str, image_path: Optional[str] = None) -> Generator[str, None, None]:
    """
    æµå¼è¯·æ±‚ï¼ˆåŒæ­¥ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼‰
    
    Args:
        question: ç”¨æˆ·é—®é¢˜
        image_path: å›¾ç‰‡è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆå¯é€‰ï¼‰ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæœ¬åœ°è·¯å¾„æˆ–URL
    """
    headers = {
        "Content-Type": "application/json",
        "Authorization": f"Bearer {API_KEY}"
    }

    content = _build_message_content_sync(question, image_path)
    
    payload = {
        "model": MODEL,
        "group": "default",
        "messages": [
            {"role": "user", "content": content}
        ],
        "temperature": TEMPERATURE,
        "stream": True,
        "frequency_penalty": 0,
        "presence_penalty": 0
    }

    with requests.post(BASE_URL, headers=headers, json=payload, stream=True) as response:
        # æ£€æŸ¥HTTPçŠ¶æ€ç 
        if response.status_code == 401:
            raise AIROEAPIError(401, "APIå¯†é’¥æ— æ•ˆæˆ–å·²è¿‡æœŸ")
        elif response.status_code == 403:
            raise AIROEAPIError(403, "è®¿é—®è¢«æ‹’ç»")
        elif response.status_code == 404:
            raise AIROEAPIError(404, "APIç«¯ç‚¹ä¸å­˜åœ¨")
        elif response.status_code == 429:
            raise AIROEAPIError(429, "è¯·æ±‚é¢‘ç‡è¶…é™")
        elif response.status_code >= 500:
            raise AIROEAPIError(response.status_code, f"æœåŠ¡å™¨é”™è¯¯")
        elif response.status_code != 200:
            raise AIROEAPIError(response.status_code, f"HTTP {response.status_code}")
        
        for line in response.iter_lines(decode_unicode=True):
            if line:
                line = line.strip()
                if line.startswith("data: "):
                    data_str = line[6:]  # å»æ‰ "data: "
                    if data_str == "[DONE]":
                        break
                    try:
                        data = json.loads(data_str)
                        
                        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰é”™è¯¯
                        if "error" in data:
                            error_msg = data["error"].get("message", str(data["error"]))
                            error_code = data["error"].get("code", "unknown")
                            raise AIROEAPIError(response.status_code, f"{error_code}: {error_msg}")
                        
                        if "choices" in data and len(data["choices"]) > 0:
                            delta = data["choices"][0].get("delta", {})
                            if "content" in delta:
                                yield delta["content"]
                    except json.JSONDecodeError:
                        continue

# å¿«æ·å‡½æ•°ï¼šå›¾ç‰‡åˆ†æ
async def analyze_image(image_path: str, question: str = "è¯¦ç»†æè¿°å›¾åƒå†…å®¹ï¼Œåœ¨ä¿¡æ¯å¯†åº¦æœ€å¤§åŒ–ä¸‹ä¿æŒä¿¡æ¯é•¿åº¦æœ€å°åŒ–ï¼Œç¦æ­¢ä½¿ç”¨æ¢è¡Œã€‚æè¿°åŒ…æ‹¬åœºæ™¯ã€ç‰©ä½“ã€é¢œè‰²ã€å¸ƒå±€ã€ç»†èŠ‚ç‰¹å¾åŠå¯èƒ½çš„å«ä¹‰ã€‚") -> str:
    """
    å¿«æ·å›¾ç‰‡åˆ†æå‡½æ•°
    
    Args:
        image_path: å›¾ç‰‡è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆæœ¬åœ°è·¯å¾„æˆ–URLï¼‰
        question: åˆ†æé—®é¢˜ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ä¸ºè¯¦ç»†æè¿°ï¼‰
    """
    return await chat_non_stream(question, image_path)

def analyze_image_sync(image_path: str, question: str = "è¯¦ç»†æè¿°å›¾åƒå†…å®¹ï¼Œåœ¨ä¿¡æ¯å¯†åº¦æœ€å¤§åŒ–ä¸‹ä¿æŒä¿¡æ¯é•¿åº¦æœ€å°åŒ–ï¼Œç¦æ­¢ä½¿ç”¨æ¢è¡Œã€‚æè¿°åŒ…æ‹¬åœºæ™¯ã€ç‰©ä½“ã€é¢œè‰²ã€å¸ƒå±€ã€ç»†èŠ‚ç‰¹å¾åŠå¯èƒ½çš„å«ä¹‰ã€‚") -> str:
    """
    å¿«æ·å›¾ç‰‡åˆ†æå‡½æ•°ï¼ˆåŒæ­¥ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼‰
    
    Args:
        image_path: å›¾ç‰‡è·¯å¾„ï¼ˆæœ¬åœ°è·¯å¾„æˆ–URLï¼‰
        question: åˆ†æé—®é¢˜ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ä¸ºè¯¦ç»†æè¿°ï¼‰
    """
    return chat_non_stream_sync(question, image_path)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    # æµ‹è¯•ä»£ç 
    async def test_async():
        # æµ‹è¯•çº¯æ–‡æœ¬èŠå¤©
        print("ğŸ”¹ æµ‹è¯•çº¯æ–‡æœ¬èŠå¤©:")
        try:
            result = await chat_non_stream("è¯·å†™ä¸€é¦–å…³äºæ˜¥å¤©çš„è¯—")
            print(result)
        except AIROEAPIError as e:
            print(f"é”™è¯¯ [{e.status_code}]: {e.message}")
        
        # æµ‹è¯•å›¾ç‰‡åˆ†æï¼ˆæœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶ï¼‰
        image_path = r"C:\Users\dell\Pictures\Screenshots\å±å¹•æˆªå›¾ 2025-07-29 083414.png"
        if os.path.exists(image_path):
            print("\nğŸ”¹ æµ‹è¯•æœ¬åœ°å›¾ç‰‡åˆ†æ:")
            try:
                result = await analyze_image(image_path)
                print(result)
            except AIROEAPIError as e:
                print(f"é”™è¯¯ [{e.status_code}]: {e.message}")
        
        # æµ‹è¯•å›¾ç‰‡èŠå¤©ï¼ˆæµå¼ï¼‰
        print("\nğŸ”¹ æµ‹è¯•å›¾ç‰‡æµå¼èŠå¤©:")
        try:
            async for chunk in chat_stream("è¿™å¼ å›¾ç‰‡æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆï¼Ÿ", image_path if os.path.exists(image_path) else None):
                print(chunk, end="", flush=True)
            print()
        except AIROEAPIError as e:
            print(f"é”™è¯¯ [{e.status_code}]: {e.message}")
    
    asyncio.run(test_async())
