# client\ollama_client.py
# ollama_client.py
import asyncio
import time
from typing import AsyncGenerator, Optional, Dict, Any, List
from ollama import Client

class OllamaClient:
    def __init__(self, 
                 host: str = "https://ollama.com",
                 token: Optional[str] = None,
                 model: str = "gpt-oss:120b",
                 max_concurrent: int = 5):
        """
        åˆå§‹åŒ– Ollama å®¢æˆ·ç«¯
        
        Args:
            host: Ollama æœåŠ¡å™¨åœ°å€
            token: è®¤è¯token
            model: ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ¨¡å‹åç§°
            max_concurrent: æœ€å¤§å¹¶å‘è¯·æ±‚æ•°
        """
        self.host = host
        self.token = token
        self.model = model
        self.semaphore = asyncio.Semaphore(max_concurrent)
        self.last_call_time = 0
        
    def _create_client(self) -> Client:
        """åˆ›å»º Ollama å®¢æˆ·ç«¯"""
        headers = {}
        if self.token:
            headers['Authorization'] = self.token
            
        return Client(host=self.host, headers=headers)
    
    def _log(self, message: str):
        """ç®€å•çš„æ—¥å¿—è¾“å‡º"""
        print(f"[OllamaClient] {message}")
    
    def _filter_think_tags(self, text: str) -> str:
        """è¿‡æ»¤æ€è€ƒæ ‡ç­¾ï¼ˆå¯æ ¹æ®éœ€è¦è‡ªå®šä¹‰ï¼‰"""
        # è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ ä½ çš„è¿‡æ»¤é€»è¾‘
        return text
    
    async def chat_stream(self, 
                         prompt: str, 
                         temperature: float = 0.2,
                         system: Optional[str] = None) -> AsyncGenerator[str, None]:
        """
        æµå¼èŠå¤©
        
        Args:
            prompt: ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥
            temperature: æ¸©åº¦å‚æ•°
            system: ç³»ç»Ÿæç¤ºè¯
            
        Yields:
            é€ä¸ªtokençš„å“åº”å†…å®¹
        """
        async with self.semaphore:
            try:
                self._log("å¼€å§‹æµå¼è°ƒç”¨")
                start_time = time.time()
                received_first_token = False
                
                client = self._create_client()
                
                messages = []
                if system:
                    messages.append({'role': 'system', 'content': system})
                messages.append({'role': 'user', 'content': prompt})
                
                for part in client.chat(
                    self.model, 
                    messages=messages, 
                    stream=True,
                    options={'temperature': temperature}
                ):
                    content = part.get('message', {}).get('content', '')
                    if content:
                        if not received_first_token:
                            received_first_token = True
                            self._log(f"æ”¶åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªtokenï¼Œè€—æ—¶: {time.time()-start_time:.2f}s")
                        yield content
                
                if not received_first_token:
                    self._log(f"è­¦å‘Š: æœªæ”¶åˆ°ä»»ä½•æœ‰æ•ˆtokenï¼Œæ€»è€—æ—¶: {time.time()-start_time:.2f}s")
                    raise Exception("æœªè¿”å›ä»»ä½•æœ‰æ•ˆæ•°æ®")
                    
            except Exception as e:
                self._log(f"æµå¼è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥: {e}")
                raise
    
    async def chat(self, 
                  prompt: str, 
                  temperature: float = 0.2,
                  system: Optional[str] = None) -> str:
        """
        éæµå¼èŠå¤©
        
        Args:
            prompt: ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥
            temperature: æ¸©åº¦å‚æ•°
            system: ç³»ç»Ÿæç¤ºè¯
            
        Returns:
            å®Œæ•´çš„å“åº”å†…å®¹
        """
        async with self.semaphore:
            try:
                self._log("å¼€å§‹éæµå¼è°ƒç”¨")
                
                client = self._create_client()
                
                messages = []
                if system:
                    messages.append({'role': 'system', 'content': system})
                messages.append({'role': 'user', 'content': prompt})
                
                response = client.chat(
                    self.model, 
                    messages=messages, 
                    stream=False,
                    options={'temperature': temperature}
                )
                
                result = response.get('message', {}).get('content', '')
                
                if result:
                    self._log("è°ƒç”¨æˆåŠŸ")
                    return self._filter_think_tags(result).strip()
                else:
                    raise Exception("è¿”å›ç©ºç»“æœ")
                    
            except Exception as e:
                self._log(f"è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥: {e}")
                raise
    
    async def chat_with_history(self, 
                               messages: List[Dict[str, str]], 
                               temperature: float = 0.2) -> str:
        """
        å¸¦å†å²è®°å½•çš„èŠå¤©
        
        Args:
            messages: æ¶ˆæ¯å†å²åˆ—è¡¨
            temperature: æ¸©åº¦å‚æ•°
            
        Returns:
            å“åº”å†…å®¹
        """
        async with self.semaphore:
            try:
                self._log("å¼€å§‹å†å²å¯¹è¯è°ƒç”¨")
                
                client = self._create_client()
                
                response = client.chat(
                    self.model, 
                    messages=messages, 
                    stream=False,
                    options={'temperature': temperature}
                )
                
                result = response.get('message', {}).get('content', '')
                
                if result:
                    self._log("å†å²å¯¹è¯è°ƒç”¨æˆåŠŸ")
                    return self._filter_think_tags(result).strip()
                else:
                    raise Exception("è¿”å›ç©ºç»“æœ")
                    
            except Exception as e:
                self._log(f"å†å²å¯¹è¯è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥: {e}")
                raise
    
    async def batch_chat(self, 
                        prompts: List[str], 
                        temperature: float = 0.2) -> List[str]:
        """
        æ‰¹é‡èŠå¤©
        
        Args:
            prompts: æç¤ºè¯åˆ—è¡¨
            temperature: æ¸©åº¦å‚æ•°
            
        Returns:
            å“åº”åˆ—è¡¨
        """
        tasks = [self.chat(prompt, temperature) for prompt in prompts]
        return await asyncio.gather(*tasks)

# ä½¿ç”¨ç¤ºä¾‹
async def main():
    client = OllamaClient(
        host="https://ollama.com",
        token="2858afc5d9044906a630666be7de7836.kDXQt_XYPxMCXZKN6wRU-lTR",  # æ›¿æ¢ä¸ºå®é™…token
        model="gpt-oss:120b"
    )
    
    # ç®€å•èŠå¤©
    response = await client.chat("ä½ å¥½ï¼Œè¯·ä»‹ç»ä¸€ä¸‹è‡ªå·±")
    print("éæµå¼å“åº”:", response)
    
    # æµå¼èŠå¤©
    print("\næµå¼å“åº”:")
    async for chunk in client.chat_stream("è®²ä¸€ä¸ªç®€çŸ­çš„æ•…äº‹"):
        print(chunk, end="", flush=True)
    print()
    


if __name__ == "__main__":
    asyncio.run(main())

# client\openrouter_client.py
# openrouter_client.py
import asyncio
import aiohttp
import json
import base64
import mimetypes
import os
from typing import AsyncGenerator, Optional, List, Union
from pathlib import Path

# é…ç½®å¸¸é‡
OPENROUTER_URL = "https://openrouter.ai/api/v1/chat/completions"
MODEL_NAME = "x-ai/grok-4-fast:free"
TIMEOUT = 60

# API å¯†é’¥åˆ—è¡¨
API_KEYS = [
    "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",
    "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",
    "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",
    "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",
    "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"
]

# å¤±è´¥çš„å¯†é’¥é›†åˆ
failed_keys = set()

class OpenRouterClient:
    def __init__(self, max_concurrent: int = 5):
        self.semaphore = asyncio.Semaphore(max_concurrent)
        
    def get_available_key(self) -> Optional[str]:
        """è·å–å¯ç”¨çš„APIå¯†é’¥"""
        available_keys = [key for key in API_KEYS if key not in failed_keys]
        if not available_keys:
            # å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰å¯ç”¨å¯†é’¥ï¼Œé‡ç½®å¤±è´¥é›†åˆå¹¶é‡è¯•
            if failed_keys:
                failed_keys.clear()
                available_keys = API_KEYS.copy()
            if not available_keys:
                return None
        return random.choice(available_keys)
    
    def _prepare_image_content(self, image_path_or_url: Union[str, Path]) -> dict:
        """å‡†å¤‡å›¾ç‰‡å†…å®¹ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶å’ŒURL"""
        if isinstance(image_path_or_url, Path):
            image_path_or_url = str(image_path_or_url)
        
        if image_path_or_url.startswith(('http://', 'https://')):
            # URLå›¾ç‰‡
            return {
                "type": "image_url",
                "image_url": {
                    "url": image_path_or_url
                }
            }
        else:
            # æœ¬åœ°æ–‡ä»¶å›¾ç‰‡
            if not os.path.exists(image_path_or_url):
                raise FileNotFoundError(f"å›¾ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶ä¸å­˜åœ¨: {image_path_or_url}")
            
            # è¯»å–å›¾ç‰‡å¹¶ç¼–ç ä¸ºbase64
            with open(image_path_or_url, 'rb') as image_file:
                image_data = base64.b64encode(image_file.read()).decode('utf-8')
            
            # è·å–MIMEç±»å‹
            mime_type, _ = mimetypes.guess_type(image_path_or_url)
            if not mime_type:
                mime_type = "image/jpeg"  # é»˜è®¤ç±»å‹
            
            return {
                "type": "image_url",
                "image_url": {
                    "url": f"data:{mime_type};base64,{image_data}"
                }
            }
    
    async def chat_stream(self, 
                         prompt: str, 
                         image_paths: Optional[List[Union[str, Path]]] = None,
                         temperature: float = 0.2) -> AsyncGenerator[str, None]:
        """æµå¼èŠå¤©ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šæ¨¡æ€"""
        api_key = self.get_available_key()
        if not api_key:
            raise RuntimeError("æ²¡æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„APIå¯†é’¥")
            
        headers = {
            "Authorization": f"Bearer {api_key}",
            "Content-Type": "application/json",
            "HTTP-Referer": "https://github.com",  # OpenRouterè¦æ±‚
            "X-Title": "OpenRouter Client"
        }
        
        # æ„å»ºæ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹
        content = [{"type": "text", "text": prompt}]
        
        # æ·»åŠ å›¾ç‰‡å†…å®¹
        if image_paths:
            for image_path in image_paths:
                image_content = self._prepare_image_content(image_path)
                content.append(image_content)
        
        body = {
            "model": MODEL_NAME,
            "messages": [
                {
                    "role": "user",
                    "content": content
                }
            ],
            "stream": True,
            "max_tokens": 4000,
            "temperature": temperature
        }
        
        async with self.semaphore:
            timeout = aiohttp.ClientTimeout(total=TIMEOUT)
            
            try:
                async with aiohttp.ClientSession(timeout=timeout) as session:
                    async with session.post(OPENROUTER_URL, headers=headers, json=body) as response:
                        if response.status != 200:
                            error_text = await response.text()
                            print(f"APIé”™è¯¯ ({response.status}): {error_text}")
                            failed_keys.add(api_key)
                            raise RuntimeError(f"APIè°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥: {error_text}")
                        
                        async for line in response.content:
                            line = line.decode("utf-8").strip()
                            if not line.startswith("data: "):
                                continue
                            
                            data = line[6:]
                            if data == "[DONE]":
                                break
                            
                            try:
                                chunk = json.loads(data)
                                if chunk.get("choices"):
                                    delta = chunk["choices"][0].get("delta", {})
                                    content = delta.get("content", "")
                                    if content:
                                        yield content
                            except json.JSONDecodeError:
                                continue
                                
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"æµå¼è°ƒç”¨å¼‚å¸¸: {e}")
                failed_keys.add(api_key)
                raise
    
    async def chat(self, 
                  prompt: str, 
                  image_paths: Optional[List[Union[str, Path]]] = None,
                  temperature: float = 0.2) -> str:
        """éæµå¼èŠå¤©ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šæ¨¡æ€"""
        api_key = self.get_available_key()
        if not api_key:
            raise RuntimeError("æ²¡æœ‰å¯ç”¨çš„APIå¯†é’¥")
            
        headers = {
            "Authorization": f"Bearer {api_key}",
            "Content-Type": "application/json",
            "HTTP-Referer": "https://github.com",  # OpenRouterè¦æ±‚
            "X-Title": "OpenRouter Client"
        }
        
        # æ„å»ºæ¶ˆæ¯å†…å®¹
        content = [{"type": "text", "text": prompt}]
        
        # æ·»åŠ å›¾ç‰‡å†…å®¹
        if image_paths:
            for image_path in image_paths:
                image_content = self._prepare_image_content(image_path)
                content.append(image_content)
        
        body = {
            "model": MODEL_NAME,
            "messages": [
                {
                    "role": "user",
                    "content": content
                }
            ],
            "stream": False,
            "max_tokens": 4000,
            "temperature": temperature
        }
        
        async with self.semaphore:
            timeout = aiohttp.ClientTimeout(total=TIMEOUT)
            
            try:
                async with aiohttp.ClientSession(timeout=timeout) as session:
                    async with session.post(OPENROUTER_URL, headers=headers, json=body) as response:
                        if response.status != 200:
                            error_text = await response.text()
                            print(f"APIé”™è¯¯ ({response.status}): {error_text}")
                            failed_keys.add(api_key)
                            raise RuntimeError(f"APIè°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥: {error_text}")
                        
                        data = await response.json()
                        return data['choices'][0]['message']['content'].strip()
                        
            except Exception as e:
                print(f"éæµå¼è°ƒç”¨å¼‚å¸¸: {e}")
                failed_keys.add(api_key)
                raise

# ä¾¿æ·å‡½æ•°
async def quick_chat(prompt: str, 
                    image_paths: Optional[List[Union[str, Path]]] = None,
                    temperature: float = 0.2) -> str:
    """å¿«é€ŸèŠå¤©ï¼ˆéæµå¼ï¼‰"""
    client = OpenRouterClient()
    return await client.chat(prompt, image_paths, temperature)

async def quick_chat_stream(prompt: str, 
                           image_paths: Optional[List[Union[str, Path]]] = None,
                           temperature: float = 0.2) -> AsyncGenerator[str, None]:
    """å¿«é€ŸèŠå¤©ï¼ˆæµå¼ï¼‰"""
    client = OpenRouterClient()
    async for chunk in client.chat_stream(prompt, image_paths, temperature):
        yield chunk

# ç¤ºä¾‹ä½¿ç”¨
async def main():
    client = OpenRouterClient()
    
    # çº¯æ–‡æœ¬ç¤ºä¾‹
    print("=== çº¯æ–‡æœ¬èŠå¤© ===")
    try:
        response = await client.chat("ä½ å¥½ï¼Œè¯·ä»‹ç»ä¸€ä¸‹è‡ªå·±")
        print(response)
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"é”™è¯¯: {e}")
    
    # å¤šæ¨¡æ€ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼ˆURLå›¾ç‰‡ï¼‰
    print("\n=== å¤šæ¨¡æ€èŠå¤©ï¼ˆURLå›¾ç‰‡ï¼‰===")
    try:
        image_url = "https://ts1.cn.mm.bing.net/th/id/R-C.987f582c510be58755c4933cda68d525?rik=C0D21hJDYvXosw&riu=http%3a%2f%2fimg.pconline.com.cn%2fimages%2fupload%2fupc%2ftx%2fwallpaper%2f1305%2f16%2fc4%2f20990657_1368686545122.jpg&ehk=netN2qzcCVS4ALUQfDOwxAwFcy41oxC%2b0xTFvOYy5ds%3d&risl=&pid=ImgRaw&r=0"
        response = await client.chat("è¯·ç”¨ä¸­æ–‡æè¿°ä¸€ä¸‹è¿™å¼ å›¾ç‰‡", [image_url])
        print(response)
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"é”™è¯¯: {e}")
    
    # æµå¼ç¤ºä¾‹
    print("\n=== æµå¼èŠå¤© ===")
    try:
        async for chunk in client.chat_stream("å†™ä¸€é¦–å…³äºæ˜¥å¤©çš„çŸ­è¯—"):
            print(chunk, end="", flush=True)
        print()  # æ¢è¡Œ
    except Exception as e:
        print(f"é”™è¯¯: {e}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import random
    asyncio.run(main())

    'image/jpeg': 'image', 'image/jpg': 'image', 'image/png': 'image', 'image/gif': 'image',
    'image/webp': 'image', 'image/bmp': 'image', 'image/svg+xml': 'image', 'image/tiff': 'image',
    'image/ico': 'image', 'video/mp4': 'video', 'video/avi': 'video', 'video/mov': 'video',
    'video/wmv': 'video', 'video/flv': 'video', 'video/webm': 'video', 'video/mkv': 'video',
    'video/3gp': 'video', 'video/m4v': 'video', 'video/quicktime': 'video', 'audio/mp3': 'audio',

    'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document': 'file',
    'application/vnd.ms-excel': 'file', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet': 'file',

    'application/x-rar-compressed': 'file', 'application/x-7z-compressed': 'file', 'application/json': 'file',

    '.jpg': 'image/jpeg', '.jpeg': 'image/jpeg', '.png': 'image/png', '.gif': 'image/gif',

    '.sh': 'text/x-shell', '.bash': 'text/x-shell', '.zsh': 'text/x-shell',
