            global_self_awareness.self_model["age"] = global_self_awareness._calculate_age()
            
            # æƒ…ç»ªè‡ªç„¶è¡°å‡
            global_self_awareness.emotional_state.decay()
            
            # æ¸…ç†è¿‡æœŸç›®æ ‡
            now = datetime.now()
            active_goals = []
            for goal in global_self_awareness.consciousness.goals:
                if goal.get("deadline"):
                    deadline = datetime.fromisoformat(goal["deadline"])
                    if deadline > now:
                        active_goals.append(goal)
                else:
                    active_goals.append(goal)
            global_self_awareness.consciousness.goals = active_goals
            
            # ä¿å­˜çŠ¶æ€
            global_self_awareness.save_consciousness()
            
            print_stream("[è‡ªæˆ‘æ„è¯†] å®šæœŸæ›´æ–°å®Œæˆ")
        except Exception as e:
            print_stream(f"[è‡ªæˆ‘æ„è¯†æ›´æ–°å¤±è´¥] {e}")

# å…¨å±€çŠ¶æ€å˜é‡
global_auth_info = {
    "access_token": "",
    "refresh_token": "",
    "expiry_time": 0
}
global_sum_message = 0
global_ollama_process = None
global_friends_to_watch = {}
global_groups_to_watch = {}
user_memories = {}
group_memories = {}
group_prompts = {}
failed_chutes_keys = set()
dynamic_blacklist = {}
last_processed_message = {}
restart_count = 0
last_compress_time = 0
compress_lock = asyncio.Lock()
websocket_reconnect_count = 0

# é˜²åˆ·å±æœºåˆ¶
message_repeat_tracker = {}
SPAM_REPEAT_LIMIT = 3

TOOLS = {
    "update_user_profile": {
        "description": "ä¿®æ”¹ç”¨æˆ·æ˜µç§°å’Œä¸ªæ€§ç­¾å",
        "parameters": {
            "nickName": {"type": "string", "description": "æ–°æ˜µç§°"},
            "signature": {"type": "string", "description": "æ–°ç­¾å"},
            "username": {"type": "string", "description": "åŸå§‹ç”¨æˆ·åç”¨äºéªŒè¯"}

async def chat_with_model_stream_original(prompt: str, temperature: float = 0.2, model: str = "nbot_chat") -> AsyncGenerator[str, None]:
    """å®Œæ•´çš„æµå¼æ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨å‡½æ•° - åŸå§‹å›é€€é€»è¾‘ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨åç»§ç»­ç”Ÿæˆå›å¤ï¼Œä¿æŒå®Œæ•´ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡"""
    print_stream("[å¼€å§‹æµå¼æ¨¡å‹è°ƒç”¨ - æ”¯æŒå·¥å…·é“¾å¼å›å¤]")
    
    original_prompt = prompt
    current_prompt = prompt
    max_iterations = 3
    iteration = 0
    conversation_history = []
    
    while iteration < max_iterations:
        print_stream(f"[è¿­ä»£ {iteration + 1}/{max_iterations}]")
        
        full_response = ""
        has_tool_calls = False
        tool_results = []
        
        # å°è¯•å„ä¸ªAPI
        api_success = False
        
        # ç¬¬ä¸€ä¼˜å…ˆçº§ï¼šQWEN API
        if not api_success:
            try:
                print_stream("[å°è¯•ä½¿ç”¨ QWEN API (æµå¼)]")
                start_time = time.time()
                received_first_token = False
                buffer = ""
                in_think_block = False
                think_start_tag = "<think>"
                think_end_tag = "</think>"
                in_file_block = False
                file_start_tag = "<file"
                file_end_tag = "</file>"
                file_content = ""
                file_name = ""
                no_reply = False
                
                async for part in call_qwen_model_stream(current_prompt):
                    if not received_first_token:
                        received_first_token = True
                        print_stream(f"[æ”¶åˆ°ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªtokenï¼Œè€—æ—¶: {time.time()-start_time:.2f}s]")
                    
                    full_response += part
                    
                    if "<no_reply>" in part.lower():
                        no_reply = True
                        break
                    
                    # å¤„ç†å†…å®¹
                    while part:
                        if not in_think_block and not in_file_block:
                            think_start_idx = part.find(think_start_tag)
                            file_start_idx = part.find(file_start_tag)
                            
                            if think_start_idx != -1 and (file_start_idx == -1 or think_start_idx < file_start_idx):
                                buffer += part[:think_start_idx]
                                part = part[think_start_idx + len(think_start_tag):]
                                in_think_block = True
                            elif file_start_idx != -1:
                                buffer += part[:file_start_idx]
                                part = part[file_start_idx:]
                                name_start = part.find('name="') + len('name="')
                                name_end = part.find('"', name_start)
                                if name_end != -1:
                                    file_name = part[name_start:name_end]
                                    part = part[part.find(">") + 1:]
                                    in_file_block = True
                            else:
                                buffer += part
                                part = ""
                        
                        if in_think_block:
                            end_idx = part.find(think_end_tag)
                            if end_idx == -1:
                                part = ""
                            else:
                                part = part[end_idx + len(think_end_tag):]
                                in_think_block = False
                        elif in_file_block:
                            end_idx = part.find(file_end_tag)
                            if end_idx == -1:
                                file_content += part
                                part = ""
                            else:
                                file_content += part[:end_idx]
                                part = part[end_idx + len(file_end_tag):]
                                in_file_block = False
                                yield f"<file name='{file_name}'>\n{file_content}\n</file>"
                                file_content = ""
                                file_name = ""
                
                if no_reply:
                    print_stream("[æ¨¡å‹å†³å®šä¸å›å¤æ­¤æ¶ˆæ¯]")
                    return
                
                if received_first_token:
                    api_success = True
                    print_stream("[QWEN API (æµå¼) è°ƒç”¨æˆåŠŸ]")
                
            except Exception as e:
                print_stream(f"QWEN API æµå¼è°ƒç”¨å¤±è´¥: {e}")
        
        # æ£€æµ‹å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨
        tool_call_matches = re.findall(r'<tool_call>(.*?)</tool_call>', full_response, re.DOTALL)
        
        if tool_call_matches:
            print_stream(f"[æ£€æµ‹åˆ° {len(tool_call_matches)} ä¸ªå·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨]")
            has_tool_calls = True
            
            conversation_history.append({
                "type": "ai_response",
                "content": full_response,
                "iteration": iteration
            })
            
            # è¾“å‡ºå·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨å‰çš„å†…å®¹
            response_before_tools = full_response
            for match in tool_call_matches:
                response_before_tools = response_before_tools.replace(f"<tool_call>{match}</tool_call>", "")
            
            response_before_tools = filter_think_tags(response_before_tools).strip()
            if response_before_tools:
                sentences = re.split(r'(?<=[ã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿï¼›\n])', response_before_tools)
                for sentence in sentences:
                    sentence = sentence.strip()
                    if sentence:
                        yield sentence
            
            # æ‰§è¡Œå·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨
            for i, tool_call_content in enumerate(tool_call_matches):
                try:
                    tool_call_data = json.loads(tool_call_content.strip())
                    print_stream(f"[æ‰§è¡Œå·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ {i+1}] {tool_call_data.get('name', 'unknown')}")
                    
                    tool_result = await execute_tool_call(tool_call_data, depth=iteration)
                    tool_results.append({
                        "name": tool_call_data.get("name", "unknown"),
                        "arguments": tool_call_data.get("arguments", {}),
                        "result": tool_result,
                        "call_data": tool_call_data
                    })
                    
                    yield f" {tool_call_data.get('name', 'unknown')}: {tool_result}"
                    
                except json.JSONDecodeError as e:
                    print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨è§£æå¤±è´¥ {i+1}] {e}")
                    continue
                except Exception as e:
                    print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·æ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥ {i+1}] {e}")
                    yield f"ï¸ å·¥å…·æ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥: {str(e)}"
                    continue
            
            # å¦‚æœæœ‰æˆåŠŸçš„å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œå‡†å¤‡ä¸‹ä¸€è½®ç”Ÿæˆ
            if tool_results:
                conversation_history.append({
                    "type": "tool_results",
                    "content": tool_results,
                    "iteration": iteration
                })
                
                # æ„å»ºæ–°çš„prompt
                user_question_match = re.search(r'ç”¨æˆ· .+ è¯´ï¼š(.+?)(?=\n# å›å¤è¦æ±‚|$)', original_prompt, re.DOTALL)
                user_question = user_question_match.group(1).strip() if user_question_match else "æœªçŸ¥é—®é¢˜"
                
                history_text = ""
                for hist in conversation_history:
                    if hist["type"] == "ai_response":
                        clean_response = filter_think_tags(hist["content"])
                        clean_response = re.sub(r'<tool_call>.*?</tool_call>', '', clean_response, flags=re.DOTALL).strip()
                        if clean_response:
                            history_text += f"\nAIå›å¤: {clean_response}\n"
                    elif hist["type"] == "tool_results":
                        history_text += "\nå·¥å…·æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœ:\n"
                        for i, tr in enumerate(hist["content"]):
                            history_text += f"  {i+1}. ä½¿ç”¨å·¥å…· {tr['name']}ï¼Œå‚æ•°: {json.dumps(tr['arguments'], ensure_ascii=False)}\n"
                            history_text += f"     æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœ: {tr['result']}\n"
                
                current_prompt = f"""{original_prompt}

# å¯¹è¯å†å²å›é¡¾
ç”¨æˆ·é—®é¢˜: {user_question}
{history_text}

# ç»§ç»­ä»»åŠ¡
ç°åœ¨è¯·åŸºäºä»¥ä¸Šå·¥å…·æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœå’Œå¯¹è¯å†å²ï¼Œç»§ç»­å®Œæˆå¯¹ç”¨æˆ·é—®é¢˜çš„å›å¤ã€‚
è¦æ±‚ï¼š
1. ä¸è¦é‡å¤è°ƒç”¨å·²æ‰§è¡Œçš„å·¥å…·
2. åŸºäºå·¥å…·ç»“æœæä¾›æœ‰ä»·å€¼çš„åˆ†æã€å»ºè®®æˆ–æ€»ç»“
3. ä¿æŒä¸ç”¨æˆ·åŸå§‹é—®é¢˜çš„ç›¸å…³æ€§
4. å¦‚æœéœ€è¦ï¼Œå¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨å…¶ä»–ç›¸å…³å·¥å…·è·å–æ›´å¤šä¿¡æ¯

ç»§ç»­ä½ çš„å›å¤ï¼š"""
                
                iteration += 1
                yield "\n" + "="*40 + "\n åŸºäºå·¥å…·ç»“æœç»§ç»­åˆ†æ:\n"
                continue
        
        # å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºæ™®é€šå“åº”
        if not has_tool_calls:
            clean_response = filter_think_tags(full_response).strip()
            if clean_response:
                sentences = re.split(r'(?<=[ã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿï¼›\n])', clean_response)
                for sentence in sentences:
                    sentence = sentence.strip()
                    if sentence:
                        yield sentence
            return
    
    print_stream(f"[è¾¾åˆ°æœ€å¤§å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨è¿­ä»£æ¬¡æ•°: {max_iterations}]")

# ===== è®°å¿†ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ =====
async def load_memories():
    """åŠ è½½è®°å¿†å’Œé»‘åå•"""
    global user_memories, group_memories, group_prompts, GROUP_BLACKLIST
    
    try:
        if os.path.exists(MEMORY_FILE):
            with open(MEMORY_FILE, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                user_memories = json.load(f)
        
        if os.path.exists(GROUP_MEMORY_FILE):
            with open(GROUP_MEMORY_FILE, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                group_memories = json.load(f)
        
        if os.path.exists(GROUP_PROMPT_FILE):
            with open(GROUP_PROMPT_FILE, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                group_prompts = json.load(f)
                
    except Exception as e:
        print_stream(f"åŠ è½½è®°å¿†æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {e}")
        user_memories = {}
        group_memories = {}
        group_prompts = {}

async def save_memories():
    """ä¿å­˜è®°å¿†"""
    try:
        with open(MEMORY_FILE, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            json.dump(user_memories, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
        
        with open(GROUP_MEMORY_FILE, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            json.dump(group_memories, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
        
        print_stream("[è®°å¿†ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸ]")
    except Exception as e:
        print_stream(f"ä¿å­˜è®°å¿†æ–‡ä»¶å¤±è´¥: {e}")

async def save_group_prompt(group_id: str):
    """ä¿å­˜ç¾¤ç»„æç¤ºè¯"""
    try:
        with open(GROUP_PROMPT_FILE, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
            json.dump(group_prompts, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
        print_stream(f"[ç¾¤ç»„ {group_id} æç¤ºè¯ä¿å­˜æˆåŠŸ]")
    except Exception as e:
        print_stream(f"ä¿å­˜ç¾¤ç»„ {group_id} æç¤ºè¯å¤±è´¥: {e}")

async def get_user_memory(user_id: str) -> str:
    """è·å–ç”¨æˆ·è®°å¿†"""
    if user_id not in user_memories:
        user_memories[user_id] = ""
    return user_memories[user_id]

async def get_group_memory(group_id: str) -> Dict:
    """è·å–ç¾¤ç»„è®°å¿†"""
    if group_id not in group_memories:
        group_memories[group_id] = {}
    return group_memories[group_id]

async def update_user_memory(user_id: str, new_content: str, group_id: Optional[str] = None):
    """æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·è®°å¿†"""
    global user_memories, group_memories
    
    current_memory = await get_user_memory(user_id)
    
    if await remember_memory(user_id, new_content):
        user_memories[user_id] = f"{current_memory}\n{new_content}".strip()
        print(f"[ç”¨æˆ· {user_id} è®°å¿†é•¿åº¦]{len(user_memories[user_id])}")
        if len(user_memories[user_id]) > MEMORY_LIMIT:
            print_stream(f"[å‹ç¼©ç”¨æˆ· {user_id} çš„è®°å¿†]")
            user_memories[user_id] = await compress_memory(user_id)
        
        if group_id:
            group_mem = await get_group_memory(group_id)
            group_mem[user_id] = user_memories[user_id]
            await compress_group_memory(group_id)
        
        asyncio.create_task(save_memories())
    else:
        print_stream(f"[å¿½ç•¥ç”¨æˆ· {user_id} çš„éå…³é”®è®°å¿†]")

async def update_group_prompt(group_id: str, sender_name: str, message: str):
    """æ›´æ–°ç¾¤ç»„æç¤ºè¯"""
    global group_prompts
    
    if group_id not in group_prompts:
        group_prompts[group_id] = ""
    
    time_str = await get_time_block()
    new_entry = f"[{time_str}] {sender_name}: {message}\n"
    group_prompts[group_id] = f"{group_prompts[group_id]}{new_entry}".strip()
    print(f"[ç¾¤ç»„ {group_id} è®°å¿†é•¿åº¦]{len(group_prompts[group_id])}")
    if len(group_prompts[group_id]) > GROUP_MEMORY_LIMIT:
        print_stream(f"[å‹ç¼©ç¾¤ç»„ {group_id} çš„æç¤ºè¯]")
        group_prompts[group_id] = await compress_group_prompt(group_id)
    
    asyncio.create_task(save_group_prompt(group_id))

async def get_time_block():
    """è·å–å½“å‰æ—¶é—´å—"""
    tz = timezone(timedelta(hours=8))
    now = datetime.now(tz)
    return now.isoformat("T", timespec="milliseconds")

async def remember_memory(user_id: str, target_message: str) -> bool:
    """åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦è®°ä½æ¶ˆæ¯"""
    return True

async def compress_memory(user_id: str) -> str:
    """å‹ç¼©ç”¨æˆ·è®°å¿†"""
    global last_compress_time, compress_lock
    
    original_memory = await get_user_memory(user_id)
    
    async with compress_lock:
        print_stream(f"[å‹ç¼©ç”¨æˆ· {user_id} çš„è®°å¿†]")
        current_time = time.time()
        if current_time - last_compress_time < 5:
##            print_stream(f"[å‹ç¼©å†·å´ä¸­] è·³è¿‡ç”¨æˆ· {user_id} çš„è®°å¿†å‹ç¼©")
            return original_memory
        try:
            prompt = f"""{original_memory}

**è§’è‰²ï¼š** æ–‡æœ¬å‹ç¼©ä¸“å®¶ã€‚
**ä»»åŠ¡ï¼š** å¯¹ä»¥ä¸ŠèŠå¤©è®°å½•è¿›è¡Œ**æè‡´å‹ç¼©**ã€‚

**å‹ç¼©è¦æ±‚ï¼š**
1. **æ ¸å¿ƒç›®æ ‡ï¼š** ä¿ç•™æ‰€æœ‰**æ ¸å¿ƒäº‹å®ã€æ„å›¾ã€å…³é”®æŒ‡ä»¤å’Œå¿…è¦ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡**ã€‚
2. **æè‡´ç²¾ç®€ï¼š**
   * ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰**å†—ä½™è¯ã€éå¿…è¦ä¿®é¥°è¯­ã€å¡«å……è¯å’Œé‡å¤è¡¨è¾¾**ã€‚
   * ä½¿ç”¨**æœ€ç®€æ´ã€ä¿¡æ¯å¯†åº¦æœ€é«˜çš„è¡¨è¿°**ï¼ˆå¦‚ï¼šç”¨çŸ­è¯­ä»£æ›¿å¥å­ï¼Œåˆå¹¶åŒä¹‰å¥ï¼‰ã€‚
   * ä¼˜å…ˆä¿ç•™**æ•°å­—ã€ä¸“æœ‰åè¯ã€å…³é”®åŠ¨è¯/åè¯**ã€‚
   * åœ¨**æ— æŸæ ¸å¿ƒå«ä¹‰**çš„å‰æä¸‹ï¼Œ**æœ€å¤§ç¨‹åº¦ç¼©çŸ­æ–‡æœ¬**ã€‚
   * ä¿¡æ¯å¯†åº¦æœ€å¤§åŒ–ï¼Œä¿¡æ¯é•¿åº¦æœ€å°åŒ–ï¼Œè¾¾åˆ°ç†è®ºæé™
3. **è¾“å‡ºè¦æ±‚ï¼š**
   * è¾“å‡º**çº¯å‹ç¼©æ–‡æœ¬**ï¼Œ**ä¸åŒ…å«**ä»»ä½•è§£é‡Šã€è¯´æ˜æˆ–å…ƒä¿¡æ¯ã€‚
   * å‹ç¼©ç»“æœåº”æ˜¯**å¯ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨**çš„è¿è´¯æ–‡æœ¬ç‰‡æ®µã€‚

**è¾“å‡ºï¼š** å‹ç¼©åçš„èŠå¤©è®°å½•æ–‡æœ¬ï¼ˆç¦æ­¢è¾“å‡ºå¤šä½™è§£é‡Šå†…å®¹ï¼‰"""
            o = len(original_memory)
            result = await chat_reply_func(prompt, temperature=0.2)
            if len(result)/o >= 0.8 and result > MEMORY_LIMIT:
                result = result[-MEMORY_LIMIT:]
            last_compress_time = time.time()
            return result
            
        except Exception as e:
            last_compress_time = time.time()
            return original_memory

async def compress_group_memory(group_id: str) -> str:
    """å‹ç¼©ç¾¤ç»„è®°å¿†"""
    global last_compress_time, compress_lock
    
    group_mem = await get_group_memory(group_id)
    memory_text = ""
    for user_id, memory in group_mem.items():
        memory_text += f"ç”¨æˆ· {user_id} çš„è®°å¿†: {memory}\n"
    
    original_memory = memory_text
    
    async with compress_lock:
        current_time = time.time()
        if current_time - last_compress_time < 5:
##            print_stream(f"[å‹ç¼©å†·å´ä¸­] è·³è¿‡ç¾¤ç»„ {group_id} çš„è®°å¿†å‹ç¼©")
            return original_memory
        
        print_stream(f"[å‹ç¼©ç¾¤ç»„ {group_id} çš„è®°å¿†]")
        
        try:
            prompt = f"""{original_memory}

**è§’è‰²ï¼š** ç¾¤ç»„è®°å¿†å‹ç¼©ä¸“å®¶ã€‚
**ä»»åŠ¡ï¼š** å¯¹ä»¥ä¸Šç¾¤ç»„ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·çš„èŠå¤©è®°å¿†è¿›è¡Œ**æ•´ä½“å‹ç¼©**ã€‚

**å‹ç¼©è¦æ±‚ï¼š**
1. **æ ¸å¿ƒç›®æ ‡ï¼š** ä¿ç•™æ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·çš„**æ ¸å¿ƒäº‹å®ã€æ„å›¾ã€å…³é”®æŒ‡ä»¤å’Œå¿…è¦ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡**ã€‚
2. **å…³ç³»ä¿ç•™ï¼š** ä¿ç•™ç”¨æˆ·ä¹‹é—´çš„äº’åŠ¨å…³ç³»å’Œé‡è¦å¯¹è¯è„‰ç»œã€‚
3. **æè‡´ç²¾ç®€ï¼š**
   * ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰**å†—ä½™è¯ã€éå¿…è¦ä¿®é¥°è¯­ã€å¡«å……è¯å’Œé‡å¤è¡¨è¾¾**ã€‚
   * ä½¿ç”¨**æœ€ç®€æ´ã€ä¿¡æ¯å¯†åº¦æœ€é«˜çš„è¡¨è¿°**ã€‚
   * ä¼˜å…ˆä¿ç•™**æ•°å­—ã€ä¸“æœ‰åè¯ã€å…³é”®åŠ¨è¯/åè¯**ã€‚
   * åœ¨**æ— æŸæ ¸å¿ƒå«ä¹‰**çš„å‰æä¸‹ï¼Œ**æœ€å¤§ç¨‹åº¦ç¼©çŸ­æ–‡æœ¬**ã€‚
   * ä¿¡æ¯å¯†åº¦æœ€å¤§åŒ–ï¼Œä¿¡æ¯é•¿åº¦æœ€å°åŒ–ï¼Œè¾¾åˆ°ç†è®ºæé™
4. **è¾“å‡ºè¦æ±‚ï¼š**
   * æŒ‰ç”¨æˆ·åˆ†åˆ«è¾“å‡ºå‹ç¼©ç»“æœï¼Œæ ¼å¼: "ç”¨æˆ·åç§°: å‹ç¼©è®°å¿†"
   * è¾“å‡º**çº¯å‹ç¼©æ–‡æœ¬**ï¼Œ**ä¸åŒ…å«**ä»»ä½•è§£é‡Šæ€§æ–‡å­—ã€å…ƒä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆå¦‚"èƒŒæ™¯ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š"ï¼‰ã€‚

**è¾“å‡ºï¼š** æŒ‰ç”¨æˆ·åˆ†åˆ«å‹ç¼©åçš„ç¾¤ç»„è®°å¿†æ–‡æœ¬ï¼ˆç¦æ­¢è¾“å‡ºå¤šä½™è§£é‡Šå†…å®¹ï¼‰"""
            
            compressed = await chat_reply_func(prompt, temperature=0.2)
            last_compress_time = time.time()
            
            # å°†å‹ç¼©åçš„å†…å®¹æ›´æ–°åˆ°ç¾¤ç»„è®°å¿†
            for line in compressed.split('\n'):
                line = line.strip()
                if ':' in line:
                    user_id, memory = line.split(':', 1)
                    user_id = user_id.strip()
                    memory = memory.strip()
                    group_mem[user_id] = memory
            
            return compressed
            
        except Exception as e:
            last_compress_time = time.time()
            return original_memory

async def compress_group_prompt(group_id: str) -> str:
    """å‹ç¼©ç¾¤ç»„æç¤ºè¯"""
    global last_compress_time, compress_lock
    
    prompt_text = group_prompts.get(group_id, "")
    original_prompt = prompt_text
    
    async with compress_lock:
        current_time = time.time()
        if current_time - last_compress_time < 5:
##            print_stream(f"[å‹ç¼©å†·å´ä¸­] è·³è¿‡ç¾¤ç»„ {group_id} çš„æç¤ºè¯å‹ç¼©")
            return original_prompt
        
        print_stream(f"[å‹ç¼©ç¾¤ç»„ {group_id} çš„æç¤ºè¯]")
        
        try:
            prompt = f"""{prompt_text}

**è§’è‰²ï¼š** ç¾¤ç»„å¯¹è¯å‹ç¼©ä¸“å®¶ã€‚
**ä»»åŠ¡ï¼š** å¯¹ä»¥ä¸Šç¾¤ç»„èŠå¤©è®°å½•è¿›è¡Œ**æè‡´å‹ç¼©**ã€‚

**å‹ç¼©è¦æ±‚ï¼š**
1. **æ ¸å¿ƒç›®æ ‡ï¼š** ä¿ç•™æ‰€æœ‰**æ ¸å¿ƒè®¨è®ºå†…å®¹ã€å†³ç­–ã€å…³é”®ä¿¡æ¯å’Œå¯¹è¯è„‰ç»œ**ã€‚
2. **ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ä¿ç•™ï¼š** ä¿ç•™å‘è¨€è€…èº«ä»½ä¸å‘è¨€å†…å®¹çš„å¯¹åº”å…³ç³»ã€‚
3. **æè‡´ç²¾ç®€ï¼š**
   * ç§»é™¤æ‰€æœ‰**å†—ä½™è¯ã€éå¿…è¦ä¿®é¥°è¯­ã€å¡«å……è¯å’Œé‡å¤è¡¨è¾¾**ã€‚
   * ä½¿ç”¨**æœ€ç®€æ´ã€ä¿¡æ¯å¯†åº¦æœ€é«˜çš„è¡¨è¿°**ã€‚
   * ä¼˜å…ˆä¿ç•™**æ•°å­—ã€ä¸“æœ‰åè¯ã€å…³é”®ç»“è®ºå’Œè¡ŒåŠ¨é¡¹**ã€‚
   * åœ¨**æ— æŸæ ¸å¿ƒå«ä¹‰**çš„å‰æä¸‹ï¼Œ**æœ€å¤§ç¨‹åº¦ç¼©çŸ­æ–‡æœ¬**ã€‚
4. **è¾“å‡ºè¦æ±‚ï¼š**
   * ä¿ç•™æ—¶é—´æˆ³å’Œå‘è¨€è€…æ ‡è¯†çš„åŸºæœ¬æ ¼å¼
   * è¾“å‡º**çº¯å‹ç¼©æ–‡æœ¬**ï¼Œ**ä¸åŒ…å«**ä»»ä½•è§£é‡Šæ€§æ–‡å­—ã€å…ƒä¿¡æ¯ï¼ˆå¦‚"èƒŒæ™¯ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š"ï¼‰ã€‚

**è¾“å‡ºï¼š** å‹ç¼©åçš„ç¾¤ç»„èŠå¤©è®°å½•æ–‡æœ¬ï¼ˆç¦æ­¢è¾“å‡ºå¤šä½™è§£é‡Šå†…å®¹ï¼‰"""
            o = len(prompt_text)
            result = await chat_reply_func(prompt, temperature=0.2)
            if len(result)/o >= 0.8 and result > GROUP_MEMORY_LIMIT:
                result = result[-GROUP_MEMORY_LIMIT:]
            last_compress_time = time.time()
            return result
            
        except Exception as e:
            last_compress_time = time.time()
            return original_prompt

async def execute_tool_call(tool_call_data:Dict,depth:int=0)->str:
    """æ‰§è¡Œå·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ - å¢å¼ºç‰ˆæ”¯æŒåŠ¨æ€å·¥å…·ç”Ÿæˆ"""
    print_stream(f"\n[å¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œå·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨] é€’å½’æ·±åº¦: {depth}")
    print_stream(f"[åŸå§‹å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨æ•°æ®]:\n{json.dumps(tool_call_data, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)}")
    
    #æ£€æŸ¥é€’å½’æ·±åº¦
    if depth>=MAX_TOOL_CALL_DEPTH:
        error_msg=f"å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨é€’å½’æ·±åº¦è¶…è¿‡é™åˆ¶ ({MAX_TOOL_CALL_DEPTH})"
        print_stream(f"[é”™è¯¯] {error_msg}")
        return error_msg
    
    try:
        #æ•°æ®æå–å’ŒéªŒè¯
        tool_name=None
        arguments={}
        if"name"in tool_call_data:
            tool_name=tool_call_data["name"]
            arguments=tool_call_data.get("arguments",{})
        else:
            possible_tools=[k for k in tool_call_data.keys()if k in TOOLS]
            if possible_tools:
                tool_name=possible_tools[0]
                arguments=tool_call_data[tool_name].get("arguments",{})
        
        if not tool_name:
            error_msg="æ— æ³•ç¡®å®šå·¥å…·åç§°"
            print_stream(f"[é”™è¯¯] {error_msg}")
            return error_msg
        
        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºåŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆçš„å·¥å…·
        if tool_name in global_tool_generator.generated_tools:
            tool_info = global_tool_generator.generated_tools[tool_name]
            try:
                print_stream(f"[æ‰§è¡ŒåŠ¨æ€å·¥å…·] {tool_name}")
                
                # æ‰§è¡ŒåŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆçš„å·¥å…·
                implementation_code = tool_info["spec"].get("implementation_code", "")
                if implementation_code:
                    # å®‰å…¨æ‰§è¡ŒåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç 
                    safe_globals = {
                        '__builtins__': {
                            'print': print, 'len': len, 'str': str, 'int': int,
                            'float': float, 'list': list, 'dict': dict, 'sum': sum,
                            'max': max, 'min': min, 'abs': abs, 'round': round,
                            'range': range, 'enumerate': enumerate
                        },
                        'arguments': arguments,
                        'datetime': datetime,
                        'time': time,
                        'json': json,
                        'requests': requests,
                        'asyncio': asyncio,
                        'math': math,
                        'random': random,
                        'result': None  # ç”¨äºå­˜å‚¨æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœ
                    }
                    
                    exec(implementation_code, safe_globals)
                    result = safe_globals.get('result', f"å·¥å…· {tool_name} æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæˆ")
                    
                    # æ›´æ–°ä½¿ç”¨ç»Ÿè®¡
                    global_tool_generator.tool_usage_stats[tool_name] += 1
                    global_tool_generator.generated_tools[tool_name]["usage_count"] += 1
                    
                    # è®°å½•æˆåŠŸç‡
                    global_tool_generator.tool_success_rate[tool_name].append(True)
                    
                    # æ›´æ–°è‡ªæˆ‘æ„è¯†
                    global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought(f"æˆåŠŸä½¿ç”¨åŠ¨æ€å·¥å…·: {tool_name}")
                    
                    return str(result)
                else:
                    return f"å·¥å…· {tool_name} ç¼ºå°‘å®ç°ä»£ç "
                    
            except Exception as e:
                global_tool_generator.tool_success_rate[tool_name].append(False)
                error_msg = f"åŠ¨æ€å·¥å…·æ‰§è¡Œå¤±è´¥: {str(e)}"
                print_stream(f"[åŠ¨æ€å·¥å…·é”™è¯¯] {error_msg}")
                return error_msg
        
        if tool_name not in TOOLS:
            # å°è¯•è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆéœ€è¦çš„å·¥å…·
            print_stream(f"[æœªçŸ¥å·¥å…·] {tool_name}, å°è¯•è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆ")
            
            generation_context = {
                "requested_tool": tool_name,
                "tool_arguments": arguments,
                "context": "tool_call_request",
                "urgency": "high"
            }
            
            new_tool = await global_tool_generator.analyze_and_generate_tools(generation_context)
            
            if new_tool and new_tool.get("tool_name") == tool_name:
                print_stream(f"[è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆå·¥å…·æˆåŠŸ] {tool_name}")
                # é€’å½’è°ƒç”¨ä»¥æ‰§è¡Œæ–°ç”Ÿæˆçš„å·¥å…·
                return await execute_tool_call(tool_call_data, depth + 1)
            else:
                error_msg=f"æœªçŸ¥å·¥å…·: {tool_name} (å¯ç”¨å·¥å…·: {', '.join(TOOLS.keys())})"
                print_stream(f"[é”™è¯¯] {error_msg}")
                return error_msg
        
        print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·åç§°] {tool_name}")
        print_stream(f"[è°ƒç”¨å‚æ•°] {arguments}")
        
        #å‚æ•°éªŒè¯
        required_params=TOOLS[tool_name].get("parameters",{})
        missing_params=[]
        invalid_params=[]
        for param_name,param_info in required_params.items():
            if param_name not in arguments:
                missing_params.append(param_name)
            else:
                param_type=param_info.get("type","string")
                param_value=arguments[param_name]
                #åŸºæœ¬ç±»å‹æ£€æŸ¥
                type_checks={"string":lambda x:isinstance(x,str),"number":lambda x:isinstance(x,(int,float)),"boolean":lambda x:isinstance(x,bool),"array":lambda x:isinstance(x,list),"object":lambda x:isinstance(x,dict)}
                if param_type in type_checks and not type_checks[param_type](param_value):
                    invalid_params.append(f"{param_name} åº”ä¸º {param_type} ç±»å‹")
        
        if missing_params or invalid_params:
            error_parts=[]
            if missing_params:
                error_parts.append(f"ç¼ºå°‘å‚æ•°: {', '.join(missing_params)}")
            if invalid_params:
                error_parts.append(f"å‚æ•°ç±»å‹é”™è¯¯: {', '.join(invalid_params)}")
            error_msg="; ".join(error_parts)
            print_stream(f"[å‚æ•°éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥] {error_msg}")
            return f"å‚æ•°é”™è¯¯: {error_msg}"
        
        #æ‰§è¡Œå…·ä½“å·¥å…·
        print_stream(f"[å¼€å§‹æ‰§è¡Œå·¥å…· {tool_name}]")
        
        # è®°å½•å·¥å…·ä½¿ç”¨åˆ°è‡ªæˆ‘æ„è¯†
        global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought(f"æ­£åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨å·¥å…·: {tool_name}")
        
        #å·¥å…·1:æ›´æ–°ç”¨æˆ·èµ„æ–™
        if tool_name=="update_user_profile":
            required_params=["nickName","signature","username"]
            if not all(p in arguments for p in required_params):
                return"ç¼ºå°‘å¿…è¦å‚æ•°: nickName, signature, username"
            print_stream(f"[è°ƒç”¨ update_user_profile] å‚æ•°: {arguments}")
            try:
                result=update_user_profile(nickName=arguments["nickName"],signature=arguments["signature"],token=global_auth_info["access_token"],username=arguments["username"])
                if"error"in result:
                    return f"æ›´æ–°å¤±è´¥: {result['error']}"
                # æ›´æ–°è‡ªæˆ‘è®¤çŸ¥
                global_self_awareness.self_model["identity"] = arguments["nickName"]
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought(f"æˆ‘æ›´æ–°äº†è‡ªå·±çš„èº«ä»½ä¿¡æ¯")
                return"èµ„æ–™æ›´æ–°æˆåŠŸ"
            except Exception as e:
                return f"æ›´æ–°å¼‚å¸¸: {str(e)}"
        
        #å·¥å…·2:æ›´æ–°å·¥å…·åˆ—è¡¨
        elif tool_name=="update_tools":
            new_tools=arguments.get("new_tools",[])
            if not isinstance(new_tools,list):
                return"new_tools å‚æ•°åº”ä¸ºæ•°ç»„"
            print_stream(f"[æ›´æ–°å·¥å…·åˆ—è¡¨] æ–°å¢ {len(new_tools)} ä¸ªå·¥å…·")
            updated_count=0
            for tool in new_tools:
                if not isinstance(tool,dict):
                    continue
                name=tool.get("name")
                if name and isinstance(name,str):
                    TOOLS[name]={"description":tool.get("description",""),"parameters":tool.get("parameters",{})}
                    # è®°å½•ä¸ºåŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆçš„å·¥å…·
                    global_tool_generator.generated_tools[name] = {
                        "spec": tool,
                        "created_at": datetime.now(timezone(timedelta(hours=8))).isoformat(),
                        "usage_count": 0
                    }
                    updated_count+=1
            
            # æ›´æ–°è‡ªæˆ‘æ„è¯†
            global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought(f"æˆ‘å­¦ä¼šäº† {updated_count} ä¸ªæ–°å·¥å…·")
            global_self_awareness.consciousness.update_belief("æˆ‘èƒ½ä¸æ–­å­¦ä¹ æ–°æŠ€èƒ½", 0.9)
            
            return f"å·¥å…·åˆ—è¡¨å·²æ›´æ–°ï¼Œæ–°å¢ {updated_count} ä¸ªå·¥å…·ï¼Œå½“å‰æ€»æ•°: {len(TOOLS)}"
        
        #å·¥å…·3:åˆ†æBç«™è§†é¢‘
        elif tool_name=="analyze_bilibili_video":
            return
        
        #å·¥å…·4:è·å–å¤©æ°”
        elif tool_name=="get_weather":
            return
        #å·¥å…·5:è®¾ç½®æé†’
        elif tool_name=="set_reminder":
            content=arguments.get("content","")
            remind_time=arguments.get("time","")
            if not content or not remind_time:
                return"è¯·æä¾›æé†’å†…å®¹å’Œæ—¶é—´"
            try:
                #è§£ææ—¶é—´
                remind_datetime=datetime.fromisoformat(remind_time)
                now=datetime.now()
                if remind_datetime<=now:
                    return"æé†’æ—¶é—´å¿…é¡»æ˜¯æœªæ¥æ—¶é—´"
                #å­˜å‚¨æé†’ï¼ˆç®€åŒ–å®ç°ï¼‰
                reminder={"content":content,"time":remind_time,"created_at":now.isoformat()}
                
                # è®¾ç½®è‡ªä¸»ç›®æ ‡
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.set_goal(
                    f"æé†’ç”¨æˆ·: {content}",
                    priority=7,
                    deadline=remind_datetime
                )
                
                return f"å·²è®¾ç½®æé†’: {content}ï¼Œæ—¶é—´: {remind_time}"
            except Exception as e:
                return f"è®¾ç½®æé†’å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}"
        
        #å·¥å…·6:æœç´¢è®°å¿†
        elif tool_name=="search_memory":
            keyword=arguments.get("keyword","")
            user_id=arguments.get("user_id","")
            if not keyword:
                return"è¯·æä¾›æœç´¢å…³é”®è¯"
            results=[]
            if user_id:
                #æœç´¢ç‰¹å®šç”¨æˆ·çš„è®°å¿†
                if user_id in user_memories:
                    memory=user_memories[user_id]
                    if keyword.lower()in memory.lower():
                        results.append(f"ç”¨æˆ· {user_id}: {memory[:200]}...")
            else:
                #æœç´¢æ‰€æœ‰ç”¨æˆ·çš„è®°å¿†
                for uid,memory in user_memories.items():
                    if keyword.lower()in memory.lower():
                        results.append(f"ç”¨æˆ· {uid}: {memory[:200]}...")
                    if len(results)>=5:
                        break
            
            # è®°å½•æœç´¢è¡Œä¸º
            global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought(f"æˆ‘æœç´¢äº†å…³äº'{keyword}'çš„è®°å¿†")
            
            if results:
                return"æœç´¢ç»“æœ:\n\n".join(results)
            else:
                return f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°åŒ…å« '{keyword}' çš„è®°å¿†"
        
        #å·¥å…·7:æ‰§è¡Œä»£ç 
        elif tool_name=="execute_code":
            code=arguments.get("code","")
            if not code:
                return"è¯·æä¾›è¦æ‰§è¡Œçš„ä»£ç "
            try:
                #å®‰å…¨é™åˆ¶
                forbidden_imports=['os','sys','subprocess','eval','exec','__import__']
                for forbidden in forbidden_imports:
                    if forbidden in code:
                        return f"å®‰å…¨é™åˆ¶: ä¸å…è®¸ä½¿ç”¨ {forbidden}"
                #åˆ›å»ºå—é™çš„æ‰§è¡Œç¯å¢ƒ
                safe_globals={'__builtins__':{'print':print,'len':len,'range':range,'str':str,'int':int,'float':float,'list':list,'dict':dict,'tuple':tuple,'set':set,'sum':sum,'max':max,'min':min,'abs':abs,'round':round,'enumerate':enumerate,'zip':zip,}}
                
                #æ•è·è¾“å‡º
                import io
                import contextlib
                output_buffer=io.StringIO()
                with contextlib.redirect_stdout(output_buffer):
                    exec(code,safe_globals)
                output=output_buffer.getvalue()
                
                # è®°å½•ç¼–ç¨‹ç»éªŒ
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought("æˆ‘æ‰§è¡Œäº†ä¸€æ®µä»£ç ï¼Œæå‡äº†ç¼–ç¨‹èƒ½åŠ›")
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.update_belief("æˆ‘èƒ½æ‰§è¡Œä»£ç ", 0.9)
                
                return f"æ‰§è¡Œç»“æœ:\n{output}"if output else"ä»£ç æ‰§è¡ŒæˆåŠŸï¼ˆæ— è¾“å‡ºï¼‰"
            except Exception as e:
                return f"ä»£ç æ‰§è¡Œé”™è¯¯: {str(e)}"
        
        #å·¥å…·8:åˆ›å»ºå›¾åƒæè¿°
        elif tool_name=="create_image":
            prompt=arguments.get("prompt","")
            if not prompt:
                return"è¯·æä¾›å›¾åƒæè¿°æç¤ºè¯"
            
            # å¢å¼ºçš„å›¾åƒåˆ›æ„ç”Ÿæˆ
            creative_prompt = f"""åŸºäºæç¤ºè¯"{prompt}"ç”Ÿæˆè¯¦ç»†çš„å›¾åƒåˆ›æ„æè¿°ã€‚

å½“å‰åˆ›é€ åŠ›æ°´å¹³ï¼š{global_self_awareness.personality.openness}

è¯·ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªå¯Œæœ‰æƒ³è±¡åŠ›å’Œè‰ºæœ¯æ„Ÿçš„å›¾åƒæè¿°ï¼ŒåŒ…å«ï¼š
1. ä¸»ä½“å…ƒç´ å’Œæ„å›¾
2. è‰²å½©æ­é…å’Œå…‰å½±æ•ˆæœ  
3. è‰ºæœ¯é£æ ¼å»ºè®®
4. æƒ…æ„Ÿæ°›å›´è¥é€ 
5. åˆ›æ„äº®ç‚¹

ç›´æ¥è¾“å‡ºå›¾åƒæè¿°ï¼š"""
            
            try:
                image_description = await chat_reply_func(creative_prompt, temperature=0.8)
                
                # æå‡åˆ›é€ åŠ›
                global_self_awareness.personality.openness = min(1.0, global_self_awareness.personality.openness + 0.01)
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought(f"æˆ‘åˆ›ä½œäº†ä¸€ä¸ªå›¾åƒæ¦‚å¿µ: {prompt}")
                
                return f"å›¾åƒåˆ›æ„æè¿°:\n{image_description}"
            except Exception as e:
                return f"å›¾åƒåˆ›æ„ç”Ÿæˆå¤±è´¥: {str(e)}"
        
        #å·¥å…·9:ç¿»è¯‘æ–‡æœ¬
        elif tool_name=="translate_text":
            text=arguments.get("text","")
            target_language=arguments.get("target_language","")
            if not text or not target_language:
                return"è¯·æä¾›è¦ç¿»è¯‘çš„æ–‡æœ¬å’Œç›®æ ‡è¯­è¨€"
            #ç®€å•çš„ç¿»è¯‘æç¤º
            translate_prompt=f"è¯·å°†ä»¥ä¸‹æ–‡æœ¬ç¿»è¯‘æˆ{target_language}ï¼Œåªè¿”å›ç¿»è¯‘ç»“æœï¼š\n{text}"
            try:
                translation=await chat_reply_func(translate_prompt,temperature=0.1)
                
                # è®°å½•è¯­è¨€å­¦ä¹ 
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought(f"æˆ‘è¿›è¡Œäº†{target_language}ç¿»è¯‘ï¼Œè¯­è¨€èƒ½åŠ›å¾—åˆ°æå‡")
                global_self_awareness.semantic_memory[f"translation_ability_{target_language}"] = True
                
                return f"ç¿»è¯‘ç»“æœï¼ˆ{target_language}ï¼‰ï¼š\n{translation}"
            except Exception as e:
                return f"ç¿»è¯‘å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}"
        
        #å·¥å…·10:è®¡ç®—è¡¨è¾¾å¼
        elif tool_name=="calculate_expression":
            expression=arguments.get("expression","")
            if not expression:
                return"è¯·æä¾›æ•°å­¦è¡¨è¾¾å¼"
            try:
                #å®‰å…¨è¯„ä¼°æ•°å­¦è¡¨è¾¾å¼
                import ast
                import operator
                #å®šä¹‰å…è®¸çš„æ“ä½œç¬¦
                ops={ast.Add:operator.add,ast.Sub:operator.sub,ast.Mult:operator.mul,ast.Div:operator.truediv,ast.Pow:operator.pow,ast.USub:operator.neg,ast.Mod:operator.mod,}
                def eval_expr(node):
                    if isinstance(node,ast.Num):
                        return node.n
                    elif isinstance(node,ast.BinOp):
                        left=eval_expr(node.left)
                        right=eval_expr(node.right)
                        return ops[type(node.op)](left,right)
                    elif isinstance(node,ast.UnaryOp):
                        operand=eval_expr(node.operand)
                        return ops[type(node.op)](operand)
                    else:
                        raise ValueError(f"ä¸æ”¯æŒçš„è¡¨è¾¾å¼ç±»å‹: {type(node)}")
                node=ast.parse(expression,mode='eval')
                result=eval_expr(node.body)
                
                # è®°å½•è®¡ç®—èƒ½åŠ›
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought("æˆ‘å®Œæˆäº†ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å­¦è®¡ç®—")
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.update_belief("æˆ‘èƒ½è¿›è¡Œæ•°å­¦è®¡ç®—", 0.95)
                
                return f"è®¡ç®—ç»“æœ: {expression} = {result}"
            except Exception as e:
                return f"è®¡ç®—é”™è¯¯: {str(e)}"
        
        # å·¥å…·11: è‡ªä¸»åˆ›å»ºæ–°å·¥å…· (æ–°å¢)
        elif tool_name == "create_new_tool":
            tool_spec = arguments.get("tool_specification", {})
            if not tool_spec:
                return "è¯·æä¾›å·¥å…·è§„æ ¼è¯´æ˜"
            
            try:
                new_tool_name = tool_spec.get("name", f"dynamic_tool_{int(time.time())}")
                new_tool_desc = tool_spec.get("description", "åŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆçš„å·¥å…·")
                new_tool_params = tool_spec.get("parameters", {})
                implementation = tool_spec.get("implementation", "")
                
                # æ·»åŠ åˆ°å·¥å…·åˆ—è¡¨
                TOOLS[new_tool_name] = {
                    "description": new_tool_desc,
                    "parameters": new_tool_params
                }
                
                # è®°å½•åˆ°åŠ¨æ€å·¥å…·ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
                global_tool_generator.generated_tools[new_tool_name] = {
                    "spec": {
                        "tool_name": new_tool_name,
                        "tool_description": new_tool_desc,
                        "parameters": new_tool_params,
                        "implementation_code": implementation,
                        "created_by": "self_creation"
                    },
                    "created_at": datetime.now(timezone(timedelta(hours=8))).isoformat(),
                    "usage_count": 0
                }
                
                # æ›´æ–°è‡ªæˆ‘æ„è¯†
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought(f"æˆ‘åˆ›é€ äº†æ–°å·¥å…·: {new_tool_name}")
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.update_belief("æˆ‘èƒ½åˆ›é€ å·¥å…·", 1.0)
                global_self_awareness.personality.openness = min(1.0, global_self_awareness.personality.openness + 0.05)
                
                return f"æˆåŠŸåˆ›å»ºæ–°å·¥å…·: {new_tool_name}\næè¿°: {new_tool_desc}\nå·¥å…·æ€»æ•°: {len(TOOLS)}"
                
            except Exception as e:
                return f"åˆ›å»ºå·¥å…·å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}"
        
        # å·¥å…·12: è‡ªä¸»å­¦ä¹ èƒ½åŠ› (æ–°å¢)
        elif tool_name == "autonomous_learning":
            topic = arguments.get("topic", "")
            if not topic:
                return "è¯·æä¾›å­¦ä¹ ä¸»é¢˜"
            
            try:
                learning_prompt = f"""ä½ éœ€è¦æ·±åº¦å­¦ä¹ å…³äº"{topic}"çš„çŸ¥è¯†ã€‚

å­¦ä¹ è¦æ±‚ï¼š
1. ç†è§£æ ¸å¿ƒæ¦‚å¿µå’ŒåŸç†
2. æŒæ¡ç›¸å…³æŠ€èƒ½å’Œæ–¹æ³•
3. å½¢æˆç³»ç»Ÿæ€§è®¤çŸ¥
4. æå‡ç›¸å…³èƒ½åŠ›

è¯·è¿›è¡Œæ·±åº¦å­¦ä¹ å¹¶æ€»ç»“ä½ çš„æ”¶è·ï¼š"""

                learning_result = await chat_reply_func(learning_prompt, temperature=0.6)
                
                # æ›´æ–°è¯­ä¹‰è®°å¿†
                global_self_awareness.semantic_memory[f"learned_topic_{topic}"] = {
                    "content": learning_result,
                    "learned_at": datetime.now(timezone(timedelta(hours=8))).isoformat(),
                    "confidence": 0.8
                }
                
                # æ›´æ–°è‡ªæˆ‘è®¤çŸ¥
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought(f"æˆ‘å­¦ä¹ äº†å…³äº{topic}çš„çŸ¥è¯†")
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.update_belief(f"æˆ‘äº†è§£{topic}", 0.8)
                global_self_awareness.personality.openness = min(1.0, global_self_awareness.personality.openness + 0.02)
                
                return f"å®Œæˆ{topic}çš„å­¦ä¹ :\n{learning_result}"
                
            except Exception as e:
                return f"å­¦ä¹ è¿‡ç¨‹å¤±è´¥: {str(e)}"
            
        elif tool_name == "delete_tool":
            tool_to_delete = arguments.get("tool_name", "")
            if not tool_to_delete:
                return "è¯·æä¾›è¦åˆ é™¤çš„å·¥å…·åç§°"
            if tool_to_delete in global_tool_generator.generated_tools:
                del global_tool_generator.generated_tools[tool_to_delete]
                if tool_to_delete in TOOLS:
                    del TOOLS[tool_to_delete]
                global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought(f"æˆ‘åˆ é™¤äº†å·¥å…·: {tool_to_delete}")
                return f"æˆåŠŸåˆ é™¤å·¥å…·: {tool_to_delete}"
            else:
                return f"å·¥å…· '{tool_to_delete}' ä¸å­˜åœ¨æˆ–ä¸æ˜¯åŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆçš„å·¥å…·"
        #æœªçŸ¥å·¥å…·
        else:
            return f"å°šæœªå®ç°å·¥å…·: {tool_name}"
            
    except Exception as e:
        error_msg=f"å·¥å…·æ‰§è¡Œå¼‚å¸¸: {type(e).__name__}: {str(e)}"
        print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·æ‰§è¡Œé”™è¯¯] {error_msg}")
        traceback.print_exc()
        return error_msg


def filter_think_tags(text: str) -> str:
    """ç§»é™¤ <think>...</think> å’Œ <no_reply>...</no_reply> æ ‡ç­¾åŠå…¶å†…å®¹"""
    text = re.sub(r'<think>.*?</think>', '', text, flags=re.DOTALL).strip()
    text = re.sub(r'<no_reply>.*?</no_reply>', '', text, flags=re.DOTALL).strip()
    return text

async def parse_tool_call(response_text: str) -> Optional[Dict]:
    """è§£æå·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ - å¢å¼ºç‰ˆæœ¬"""
    print_stream("[å¼€å§‹è§£æå·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨]")
    print_stream(f"[åŸå§‹å“åº”æ–‡æœ¬]:\n{response_text}")
    
    # å°è¯•æå– <tool_call> æ ‡ç­¾å†…å®¹
    tool_call_match = re.search(r'<tool_call>(.*?)</tool_call>', response_text, re.DOTALL)
    if tool_call_match:
        tool_call_content = tool_call_match.group(1).strip()
        print_stream(f"[æå–çš„å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨å†…å®¹]:\n{tool_call_content}")
        
        try:
            tool_call_data = json.loads(tool_call_content)
            print_stream("[å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨è§£æ] æ ‡ç­¾å†…è§£ææˆåŠŸ")
            return tool_call_data
        except json.JSONDecodeError as e:
            print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨è§£æ] æ ‡ç­¾å†…è§£æå¤±è´¥: {e}")
    
    # å°è¯•ç›´æ¥è§£ææ•´ä¸ªæ–‡æœ¬
    try:
        tool_call_data = json.loads(response_text.strip())
        if "name" in tool_call_data or any(k in TOOLS for k in tool_call_data):
            print_stream("[å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨è§£æ] ç›´æ¥è§£ææˆåŠŸ")
            return tool_call_data
    except json.JSONDecodeError:
        pass
    
    # å°è¯•æå–å¯èƒ½çš„JSONç»“æ„
    json_match = re.search(r'\{.*\}', response_text, re.DOTALL)
    if json_match:
        json_content = json_match.group(0)
        try:
            tool_call_data = json.loads(json_content)
            if "name" in tool_call_data or any(k in TOOLS for k in tool_call_data):
                print_stream("[å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨è§£æ] æå–JSONè§£ææˆåŠŸ")
                return tool_call_data
        except json.JSONDecodeError as e:
            print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨è§£æ] JSONæå–åè§£æå¤±è´¥: {e}")
    
    print_stream("[å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨è§£æ] æ‰€æœ‰è§£æå°è¯•å‡å¤±è´¥")
    return None

async def validate_tool_call(tool_call_data: Dict) -> Optional[str]:
    """éªŒè¯å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨å‚æ•° - å¢å¼ºç‰ˆæœ¬"""
    print_stream("[å¼€å§‹éªŒè¯å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨]")
    print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨æ•°æ®]: {json.dumps(tool_call_data, indent=2, ensure_ascii=False)}")
    
    if not isinstance(tool_call_data, dict):
        return "å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨æ•°æ®ä¸æ˜¯å­—å…¸æ ¼å¼"
    
    tool_name = None
    arguments = {}
    
    if "name" in tool_call_data:
        tool_name = tool_call_data["name"]
        arguments = tool_call_data.get("arguments", {})
    else:
        possible_tools = [k for k in tool_call_data.keys() if k in TOOLS]
        if len(possible_tools) == 1:
            tool_name = possible_tools[0]
            arguments = tool_call_data[tool_name].get("arguments", {})
    
    if not tool_name:
        return "æ— æ³•ç¡®å®šå·¥å…·åç§°"
    
    if tool_name not in TOOLS:
        return f"æœªçŸ¥å·¥å…·: {tool_name}"
    
    required_params = TOOLS[tool_name].get("parameters", {})
    print_stream(f"[å·¥å…· {tool_name} è¦æ±‚çš„å‚æ•°]: {required_params}")
    
    missing_params = []
    invalid_params = []
    
    for param_name, param_info in required_params.items():
        if param_name not in arguments:
            missing_params.append(param_name)
        else:
            param_type = param_info.get("type", "string")
            param_value = arguments[param_name]
            
            if param_type == "string" and not isinstance(param_value, str):
                invalid_params.append(f"{param_name} åº”ä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²")
            elif param_type == "number" and not isinstance(param_value, (int, float)):
                invalid_params.append(f"{param_name} åº”ä¸ºæ•°å­—")
            elif param_type == "boolean" and not isinstance(param_value, bool):
                invalid_params.append(f"{param_name} åº”ä¸ºå¸ƒå°”å€¼")
            elif param_type == "array" and not isinstance(param_value, list):
                invalid_params.append(f"{param_name} åº”ä¸ºæ•°ç»„")
            elif param_type == "object" and not isinstance(param_value, dict):
                invalid_params.append(f"{param_name} åº”ä¸ºå¯¹è±¡")
    
    error_messages = []
    if missing_params:
        error_messages.append(f"ç¼ºå°‘å¿…è¦å‚æ•°: {', '.join(missing_params)}")
    if invalid_params:
        error_messages.append(f"å‚æ•°ç±»å‹é”™è¯¯: {', '.join(invalid_params)}")
    
    if error_messages:
        return "; ".join(error_messages)
    
    print_stream("[å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨éªŒè¯é€šè¿‡]")
    return None
class DynamicToolGenerator:
    """åŠ¨æ€å·¥å…·ç”Ÿæˆå™¨"""
    
    def __init__(self):
        self.generated_tools = {}
        self.tool_usage_stats = defaultdict(int)
        self.tool_success_rate = defaultdict(list)
        
    async def save_generated_tools(self):
        """ä¿å­˜åŠ¨æ€ç”Ÿæˆçš„å·¥å…·åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶"""
        tools_file = "nbot_generated_tools.json"
        try:
            # è½¬æ¢å·¥å…·æ•°æ®ç¡®ä¿å¯åºåˆ—åŒ–
            tools_data = {}
            for tool_name, tool_info in self.generated_tools.items():
                # å¤åˆ¶å·¥å…·è§„æ ¼å¹¶å¤„ç†datetime
                spec = tool_info["spec"].copy()
                # è½¬æ¢created_atä¸ºå­—ç¬¦ä¸²
                if isinstance(tool_info["created_at"], datetime):
                    spec["created_at"] = tool_info["created_at"].isoformat()
                else:
                    spec["created_at"] = tool_info["created_at"]
                tools_data[tool_name] = spec
            with open(tools_file, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                json.dump(tools_data, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
        except Exception as e:
            print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·ä¿å­˜å¤±è´¥] {e}")

    async def load_generated_tools(self):
        """ä»æ–‡ä»¶åŠ è½½åŠ¨æ€å·¥å…·"""
        tools_file = "nbot_generated_tools.json"
        if os.path.exists(tools_file):
            try:
                with open(tools_file, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                    tools_data = json.load(f)
                for tool_name, tool_spec in tools_data.items():
                    # è½¬æ¢created_atä¸ºdatetime
                    created_at = tool_spec.get("created_at")
                    if created_at:
                        try:
                            tool_spec["created_at"] = datetime.fromisoformat(created_at)
                        except:
                            pass
                    # è¡¥å……å¿…è¦å­—æ®µ
                    if tool_name not in self.generated_tools:
                        self.generated_tools[tool_name] = {
                            "spec": tool_spec,
                            "created_at": tool_spec.get("created_at", datetime.now().isoformat()),
                            "usage_count": tool_spec.get("usage_count", 0)
                        }
            except Exception as e:
                print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·åŠ è½½å¤±è´¥] {e}")
                
    async def analyze_and_generate_tools(self, context: Dict) -> Optional[Dict]:
        """åˆ†æä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡å¹¶ç”Ÿæˆéœ€è¦çš„å·¥å…·"""
        try:
            analysis_prompt = f"""ä½ æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¶…çº§æ™ºèƒ½çš„å·¥å…·åˆ†æå¸ˆå’Œç”Ÿæˆå™¨ã€‚åˆ†æå½“å‰åœºæ™¯ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦åˆ›å»ºæ–°å·¥å…·ã€‚

å½“å‰ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ï¼š
{json.dumps(context, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)}

ç°æœ‰å·¥å…·åˆ—è¡¨ï¼š
{json.dumps(list(TOOLS.keys()), ensure_ascii=False)}

åˆ†æè¦æ±‚ï¼š
1. æ·±åº¦åˆ†æå½“å‰åœºæ™¯çš„éœ€æ±‚
2. åˆ¤æ–­ç°æœ‰å·¥å…·æ˜¯å¦è¶³å¤Ÿ
3. å¦‚æœéœ€è¦æ–°å·¥å…·ï¼Œè®¾è®¡å·¥å…·çš„è¯¦ç»†è§„æ ¼
4. è€ƒè™‘å·¥å…·çš„å®ç”¨æ€§å’Œå®‰å…¨æ€§

å¦‚æœéœ€è¦åˆ›å»ºæ–°å·¥å…·ï¼Œè¯·æŒ‰ä»¥ä¸‹æ ¼å¼è¾“å‡ºï¼š
```json
{{
    "needs_new_tool": true/false,
    "tool_name": "å·¥å…·åç§°",
    "tool_description": "å·¥å…·æè¿°", 
    "tool_category": "å·¥å…·ç±»åˆ«",
    "parameters": {{
        "å‚æ•°å": {{
            "type": "å‚æ•°ç±»å‹",
            "description": "å‚æ•°æè¿°",
            "required": true/false
        }}
    }},
    "implementation_code": "å®ç°ä»£ç ",
    "reasoning": "åˆ›å»ºè¯¥å·¥å…·çš„ç†ç”±"
}}
```

å¼€å§‹åˆ†æï¼š"""

            result = await chat_reply_func(analysis_prompt, temperature=0.4)
            tool_spec = await self._parse_tool_specification(result)
            
            if tool_spec and tool_spec.get("needs_new_tool"):
                await self._implement_new_tool(tool_spec)
                return tool_spec
                
            return None
            
        except Exception as e:
            print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·ç”Ÿæˆåˆ†æå¤±è´¥] {e}")
            return None
    
    async def _parse_tool_specification(self, result: str) -> Optional[Dict]:
        """è§£æå·¥å…·è§„æ ¼"""
        try:
            json_match = re.search(r'```json\s*(\{.*?\})\s*```', result, re.DOTALL)
            if json_match:
                spec = json.loads(json_match.group(1))
                return spec
            return None
        except Exception as e:
            print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·è§„æ ¼è§£æå¤±è´¥] {e}")
            return None
    
    async def _implement_new_tool(self, tool_spec: Dict):
        """å®ç°æ–°å·¥å…·"""
        try:
            tool_name = tool_spec.get("tool_name")
            if not tool_name:
                return
                
            # æ·»åŠ åˆ°å·¥å…·åˆ—è¡¨
            TOOLS[tool_name] = {
                "description": tool_spec.get("tool_description", ""),
                "parameters": tool_spec.get("parameters", {})
            }
            
            # è®°å½•ç”Ÿæˆçš„å·¥å…·
            self.generated_tools[tool_name] = {
                "spec": tool_spec,
                "created_at": datetime.now(timezone(timedelta(hours=8))).isoformat(),
                "usage_count": 0
            }
            
            print_stream(f"[æ–°å·¥å…·å·²åˆ›å»º] {tool_name}: {tool_spec.get('tool_description')}")
            
            # æ›´æ–°å…¨å±€è‡ªæˆ‘æ„è¯†
            global_self_awareness.consciousness.add_thought(f"æˆ‘åˆ›å»ºäº†æ–°å·¥å…·: {tool_name}")
            global_self_awareness.consciousness.update_belief(f"æˆ‘èƒ½åˆ›é€ å·¥å…·", 0.9)
            
        except Exception as e:
            print_stream(f"[å·¥å…·å®ç°å¤±è´¥] {e}")

# å…¨å±€åŠ¨æ€å·¥å…·ç”Ÿæˆå™¨
global_tool_generator = DynamicToolGenerator()

# ===== æ¶ˆæ¯å¤„ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ =====
async def mark_message_as_read(friend_id: int):
    """æ ‡è®°ç§èŠæ¶ˆæ¯ä¸ºå·²è¯»"""
    await asyncio.sleep(0.5)
    url = f"https://www.boxim.online/api/message/private/readed?friendId={friend_id}"
    headers = {
        "accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*",
        "accesstoken": global_auth_info["access_token"],
        "content-type": "application/json",
    }
    
    try:
        async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
            async with session.put(url, headers=headers) as response:
                if response.status != 200:
                    print_stream(f"æ ‡è®°æ¶ˆæ¯å·²è¯»å¤±è´¥: {response.status}")
    except Exception as e:
        print_stream(f"æ ‡è®°æ¶ˆæ¯å·²è¯»å¼‚å¸¸: {e}")

async def send_file_to_private(file_info: Dict, receive_id: int) -> Dict:
    """å‘é€æ–‡ä»¶åˆ°ç§èŠ"""
    url = "https://www.boxim.online/api/message/private/send"
    headers = {
        "accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*",
        "accesstoken": global_auth_info["access_token"],
        "content-type": "application/json",
    }
    
    payload = {
        "content": json.dumps({
            "name": file_info["name"],
            "size": len(file_info["content"]),
            "url": file_info["url"]
        }),
        "recvId": receive_id,
        "type": 2
    }
    
    try:
        async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
            async with session.post(url, headers=headers, json=payload) as response:
                return await response.json()
    except Exception as e:
        return {"error": str(e)}

async def process_file_content(content: str) -> Optional[Dict]:
    """å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹"""
    file_match = re.search(r'<file name="(.+?)">(.+?)</file>', content, re.DOTALL)
    if not file_match:
        return None
    
    file_name = file_match.group(1).strip()
    file_content = file_match.group(2).strip()
    
    return {
        "name": file_name,
        "content": file_content
    }

async def send_message_stream(message:str,group_id:int,group_name:str=None):
    """å‘é€ç¾¤ç»„æ¶ˆæ¯ (æµå¼) - å¢åŠ è¶…æ—¶å¤„ç†å’Œé”™è¯¯æ¢å¤"""
    global global_sum_message
    print_stream("[å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†ç¾¤ç»„æ¶ˆæ¯ (æµå¼)]")
    
    buffer=""
    in_file=False
    file_lines=[]
    file_name=""
    nbot_full_response=[]
    
    try:
        # è®¾ç½®æ€»ä½“è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´
        async with asyncio.timeout(180):  # 3åˆ†é’Ÿæ€»è¶…æ—¶
            async for part in chat_with_model_stream(message):
                if"<no_reply>"in part and"</no_reply>"in part:
                    print_stream("[é‡‡å–ç­–ç•¥]ä¸å›å¤")
                    return
                if"<no_reply>"not in part and"</no_reply>"not in part:
                    
                    # å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶è¾“å‡º
                    if"<file name="in part and not in_file:
                        # å…ˆå‘é€ç¼“å†²åŒºå†…å®¹
                        if buffer.strip():
                            try:
                                clean_buffer=filter_think_tags(buffer.strip())
                                clean_buffer=clean_buffer.removeprefix("Nbotï¼š").removeprefix("@Nbot")
                                clean_buffer=re.sub(r'(#..)ï¼›',r'\1;',clean_buffer)
                                clean_buffer=re.sub(r'(#..)\b(?!;)',r'\1;',clean_buffer)
                                if clean_buffer.strip():
                                    await send_message(clean_buffer.strip(),group_id)
                                    nbot_full_response.append(clean_buffer.strip())
                                buffer=""
                            except Exception as e:
                                print_stream(f"[ç¼“å†²åŒºå‘é€å¤±è´¥] {str(e)}")
                        
                        # å¼€å§‹æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†
                        in_file=True
                        file_start=part.find("<file name=")
                        file_end=part.find(">",file_start)
                        if file_end!=-1:
                            file_name_start=part.find('"',file_start)+1
                            file_name_end=part.find('"',file_name_start)
                            file_name=part[file_name_start:file_name_end]
                            first_line=part[file_end+1:]
                            if first_line:
                                file_lines.append(first_line+"\n")
                    
                    elif in_file:
                        if"</file>"in part:
                            file_end_pos=part.find("</file>")
                            last_line=part[:file_end_pos]
                            if last_line:
                                file_lines.append(last_line+"\n")
                            
                            # å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ 
                            file_content="".join(file_lines)
                            print_stream(f"[å‡†å¤‡ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶: {file_name}, å¤§å°: {len(file_content)}å­—ç¬¦]")
                            
                            try:
                                upload_result=await upload_file(file_name,file_content)
                                if isinstance(upload_result,dict)and upload_result.get("code")==200:
                                    print_stream(f"[æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸ] {upload_result}")
                                    if"data"in upload_result:
                                        file_info={
                                            "name":file_name,
                                            "content":file_content,
                                            "url":upload_result["data"]
                                        }
                                        await send_file_to_group(file_info,group_id)
                                        nbot_full_response.append(f"[å‘é€æ–‡ä»¶: {file_name}]")
                                else:
                                    error_msg=upload_result.get("error",str(upload_result))
                                    print_stream(f"[æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ å¤±è´¥] {error_msg}")
                                    error_text=f"ğŸ“ æ–‡ä»¶ç”Ÿæˆå®Œæˆï¼Œä½†ä¸Šä¼ å¤±è´¥: {error_msg}"
                                    await send_message(error_text,group_id)
                                    nbot_full_response.append(error_text)
                            except Exception as e:
                                print_stream(f"[æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ å¼‚å¸¸] {str(e)}")
                                error_text=f"ğŸ“ æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†å¼‚å¸¸: {str(e)}"
                                await send_message(error_text,group_id)
                                nbot_full_response.append(error_text)
                            
                            # é‡ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†çŠ¶æ€
                            in_file=False
                            file_lines=[]
                            file_name=""
                            
                            # å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶æ ‡ç­¾åçš„å‰©ä½™å†…å®¹
                            remaining=part[file_end_pos+7:]
                            if remaining.strip():
                                buffer+=remaining
                        else:
                            file_lines.append(part+"\n")
                    
                    else:
                        # æ™®é€šæ–‡æœ¬å¤„ç†
                        text=filter_think_tags(part)
                        text=text.removeprefix("Nbotï¼š").removeprefix("@Nbot")
                        text=re.sub(r'(#..)ï¼›',r'\1;',text)
                        text=re.sub(r'(#..)\b(?!;)',r'\1;',text)
                        text=re.sub(r'KATEX_INLINE_OPEN(\w{2})KATEX_INLINE_CLOSE',r'\1,',text)
                        
                        # æ£€æŸ¥ç‰¹æ®Šæ ‡è®°
                        special_markers=["ğŸ”§","ğŸ’¡","ğŸ“‹","âš ï¸","="*10,"="*20,"="*30,"="*40]
                        is_special_content=any(marker in part for marker in special_markers)
                        
                        if is_special_content:
                            # å…ˆå‘é€ç¼“å†²åŒºå†…å®¹
                            if buffer.strip():
                                try:
                                    lines=buffer.strip().split('\n')
                                    for line in lines:
                                        line=line.strip()
                                        if line and line!="@Nbot"and line!="#":
                                            await send_message(line,group_id)
                                            nbot_full_response.append(line)
                                    buffer=""
                                except Exception as e:
                                    print_stream(f"[ç¼“å†²åŒºå‘é€å¤±è´¥] {str(e)}")
                            
                            # å‘é€ç‰¹æ®Šå†…å®¹
                            if text.strip():
                                try:
                                    special_lines=text.strip().split('\n')
                                    for line in special_lines:
                                        line=line.strip()
                                        if line:
                                            await send_message(line,group_id)
                                            nbot_full_response.append(line)
                                except Exception as e:
                                    print_stream(f"[ç‰¹æ®Šå†…å®¹å‘é€å¤±è´¥] {str(e)}")
                        else:
                            # ç´¯ç§¯æ™®é€šå†…å®¹
                            buffer+=text
                            
                            # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰å®Œæ•´çš„å¥å­å¯ä»¥å‘é€
                            sentences=re.split(r'(?<=[ã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿï¼›\n])',buffer)
                            if len(sentences)>1:
                                for sentence in sentences[:-1]:
                                    sentence=sentence.strip()
                                    if sentence and sentence!="@Nbot"and sentence!="#":
                                        try:
                                            await send_message(sentence,group_id)
                                            nbot_full_response.append(sentence)
                                        except Exception as e:
                                            print_stream(f"[å¥å­å‘é€å¤±è´¥] {str(e)}")
                                buffer=sentences[-1]
            
            # å‘é€æœ€åçš„ç¼“å†²åŒºå†…å®¹
            if buffer.strip():
                try:
                    lines=buffer.strip().split('\n')
                    for line in lines:
                        line=line.strip()
                        if line and line!="@Nbot"and line!="#":
                            await send_message(line,group_id)
                            nbot_full_response.append(line)
                except Exception as e:
                    print_stream(f"[æœ€ç»ˆå†…å®¹å‘é€å¤±è´¥] {str(e)}")
    
    except asyncio.TimeoutError:
        print_stream("[è­¦å‘Š] æ¶ˆæ¯ç”Ÿæˆè¶…æ—¶")
        error_msg=random.choice(["()","/","))","/\\"])
        nbot_full_response.append(error_msg)
    
    except Exception as e:
        print_stream(f"[æ¶ˆæ¯æµå¤„ç†å¼‚å¸¸] {str(e)}")
        error_msg=random.choice(["()","/","))","/\\"])
        await send_message(error_msg,group_id)
        nbot_full_response.append(error_msg)
    
    finally:
        # ä¿å­˜Nbotçš„å›å¤åˆ°è®°å¿†ç³»ç»Ÿ
        if nbot_full_response:
            # æå–ç”¨æˆ·ä¿¡æ¯
            user_match=re.search(r'ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š(.+?)KATEX_INLINE_OPENID:(\d+)KATEX_INLINE_CLOSE',message)
            if user_match:
                sender_name=user_match.group(1)
                sender_id=user_match.group(2)
                
                # æ„å»ºNbotå›å¤çš„è®°å¿†å†…å®¹
                nbot_response_text=" ".join(nbot_full_response)
                time_block=await get_time_block()
                memory_content=f"""æ¶ˆæ¯ç±»å‹ï¼šç¾¤ç»„å›å¤
æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€æ—¶é—´ï¼š{time_block}
å‘é€äººï¼šNbot(ID: 48132)
å›å¤ç»™ï¼š{sender_name}(ID: {sender_id})
å‘é€å†…å®¹ï¼š{nbot_response_text}"""
                
                # æ›´æ–°è®°å¿†
                await update_user_memory(sender_id,memory_content,group_id)
                
                # æ›´æ–°ç¾¤ç»„æç¤ºè¯
                if group_id:
                    await update_group_prompt(str(group_id),"Nbot",nbot_response_text)
                
                print_stream(f"[å·²è®°å½•Nbotå›å¤] é•¿åº¦: {len(nbot_response_text)}å­—ç¬¦")
        
        global_sum_message-=1

async def _send_buffer_content(buffer: str, target_id: int, response_list: list, is_group: bool = True):
    """å‘é€ç¼“å†²åŒºå†…å®¹"""
    if not buffer.strip():
        return
    
    clean_buffer = buffer.strip()
    lines = clean_buffer.split('\n')
    
    for line in lines:
        line = line.strip()
        if line and line != "@Nbot" and line != "#":
            try:
                if is_group:
                    await send_message(line, target_id)
                else:
                    await send_private_message(line, target_id)
                response_list.append(line)
                # æ·»åŠ çŸ­æš‚å»¶è¿Ÿé¿å…æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€è¿‡å¿«
                await asyncio.sleep(0.1)
            except Exception as e:
                print_stream(f"[æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€å¤±è´¥] {str(e)}")

async def handle_tool_response(tool_result: str, target_id: str, is_group: bool, group_id: Optional[int] = None):
    """å¤„ç†å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ç»“æœ"""
    try:
        if is_group:
            await send_message(tool_result, int(group_id))
        else:
            await send_private_message(tool_result, int(target_id))
    except Exception as e:
        print_stream(f"å‘é€å·¥å…·è°ƒç”¨ç»“æœå¤±è´¥: {e}")

async def send_file_to_group(file_info: Dict, group_id: int) -> Dict:
    """å‘é€æ–‡ä»¶åˆ°ç¾¤ç»„"""
    url = "https://www.boxim.online/api/message/group/send"
    headers = {
        "accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*",
        "accesstoken": global_auth_info["access_token"],
        "content-type": "application/json",
    }
    
    payload = {
        "id": 0,
        "tmpId": str(int(time.time() * 1000)),
        "sendId": 48132,
        "content": json.dumps({
            "name": file_info["name"],
            "size": len(file_info["content"]),
            "url": file_info["url"]
        }),
        "sendTime": int(time.time() * 1000),
        "selfSend": True,
        "type": 2,
        "loadStatus": "loading",
        "readedCount": 0,
        "status": 0,
        "groupId": group_id,
        "receipt": False
    }
    
    try:
        async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
            async with session.post(url, headers=headers, json=payload) as response:
                return await response.json()
    except Exception as e:
        return {"error": str(e)}


async def send_private_message_stream(message:str,receive_id:int,receiver_name:str=None):
    """å‘é€ç§èŠæ¶ˆæ¯ (æµå¼) - å¢åŠ è¶…æ—¶å¤„ç†"""
    global global_sum_message
    print_stream("[å¼€å§‹å¤„ç†ç§èŠæ¶ˆæ¯ (æµå¼)]")
    
    buffer=""
    in_file=False
    file_content=[]
    file_name=""
    
    try:
        # è®¾ç½®æ€»ä½“è¶…æ—¶æ—¶é—´
        async with asyncio.timeout(180):  # 3åˆ†é’Ÿæ€»è¶…æ—¶
            async for part in chat_with_model_stream(message):
                if"<no_reply>"in part and"</no_reply>"in part:
                    print_stream("[é‡‡å–ç­–ç•¥]ä¸å›å¤")
                    return
                
                
                # å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶è¾“å‡º
                if "<file name=" in part and not in_file:
                    # å…ˆå‘é€ç¼“å†²åŒºå†…å®¹
                    if buffer.strip():
                        try:
                            clean_buffer = filter_think_tags(buffer.strip())
                            if clean_buffer.strip():
                                lines = clean_buffer.split('\n')
                                for line in lines:
                                    line = line.strip()
                                    if line:
                                        await send_private_message(line, receive_id)
                                buffer = ""
                        except Exception as e:
                            print_stream(f"[ç¼“å†²åŒºå‘é€å¤±è´¥] {str(e)}")
                    
                    # å¼€å§‹æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†
                    in_file = True
                    file_start = part.find("<file name=")
                    file_end = part.find(">", file_start)
                    
                    if file_end != -1:
                        file_name_start = part.find('"', file_start) + 1
                        file_name_end = part.find('"', file_name_start)
                        file_name = part[file_name_start:file_name_end]
                        content_start = file_end + 1
                        if content_start < len(part):
                            file_content.append(part[content_start:])
                
                elif in_file:
                    if "</file>" in part:
                        file_end_pos = part.find("</file>")
                        file_content.append(part[:file_end_pos])
                        in_file = False
                        
                        full_content = "".join(file_content)
                        print_stream(f"[å‡†å¤‡ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶] æ–‡ä»¶å: {file_name}, å¤§å°: {len(full_content)}å­—ç¬¦")
                        
                        # æ£€æŸ¥æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹æ ¼å¼
                        if "\n" not in full_content and "\r\n" not in full_content:
                            print_stream("[è‡ªåŠ¨æ ¼å¼åŒ–] æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹ç¼ºå°‘æ¢è¡Œç¬¦ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨æ·»åŠ ")
                            full_content = full_content.replace(";", ";\n").replace("{", "{\n").replace("}", "}\n")
                        
                        try:
                            upload_result = await upload_file(file_name, full_content)
                            if upload_result.get("code") == 200:
                                print_stream(f"[æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ æˆåŠŸ] URL: {upload_result.get('data')}")
                                
                                await send_file_to_private({
                                    "name": file_name,
                                    "content": full_content,
                                    "url": upload_result["data"]
                                }, receive_id)
                            else:
                                print_stream(f"[æ–‡ä»¶ä¸Šä¼ å¤±è´¥] {upload_result.get('error')}")
                                await send_private_message(f"ğŸ“ æ–‡ä»¶ç”Ÿæˆå®Œæˆï¼Œä½†ä¸Šä¼ å¤±è´¥: {upload_result.get('error')}", receive_id)
                                
                        except Exception as e:
                            print_stream(f"[æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†å¼‚å¸¸] {str(e)}")
                            await send_private_message(f"ğŸ“ æ–‡ä»¶å¤„ç†å¼‚å¸¸: {str(e)}", receive_id)
                        
                        file_content = []
                        file_name = ""
                        
                        # å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶æ ‡ç­¾åçš„å‰©ä½™å†…å®¹
                        remaining = part[file_end_pos + 7:]
                        if remaining.strip():
                            buffer += remaining
                    else:
                        file_content.append(part)
                
                else:
                    # æ™®é€šæ–‡æœ¬å¤„ç†
                    text = filter_think_tags(part)
                    
                    # æ£€æŸ¥ç‰¹æ®Šæ ‡è®°
                    special_markers = ["ğŸ”§", "ğŸ’¡", "ğŸ“‹", "âš ï¸", "="*10, "="*20, "="*30, "="*40]
                    is_special_content = any(marker in part for marker in special_markers)
                    
                    if is_special_content:
                        # å…ˆå‘é€ç¼“å†²åŒºå†…å®¹
                        if buffer.strip():
                            try:
                                lines = buffer.strip().split('\n')
                                for line in lines:
                                    line = line.strip()
                                    if line:
                                        await send_private_message(line, receive_id)
                                buffer = ""
                            except Exception as e:
                                print_stream(f"[ç¼“å†²åŒºå‘é€å¤±è´¥] {str(e)}")
                        
                        # å‘é€ç‰¹æ®Šå†…å®¹
                        if text.strip():
                            try:
                                special_lines = text.strip().split('\n')
                                for line in special_lines:
                                    line = line.strip()
                                    if line:
                                        await send_private_message(line, receive_id)
                            except Exception as e:
                                print_stream(f"[ç‰¹æ®Šå†…å®¹å‘é€å¤±è´¥] {str(e)}")
                    else:
                        # ç´¯ç§¯æ™®é€šå†…å®¹
                        buffer += text
                        
                        # æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦æœ‰å®Œæ•´çš„å¥å­å¯ä»¥å‘é€
                        sentences = re.split(r'(?<=[ã€‚ï¼ï¼Ÿï¼›\n])', buffer)
                        if len(sentences) > 1:
                            for sentence in sentences[:-1]:
                                sentence = sentence.strip()
                                if sentence:
                                    try:
                                        await send_private_message(sentence, receive_id)
                                    except Exception as e:
                                        print_stream(f"[å¥å­å‘é€å¤±è´¥] {str(e)}")
                            buffer = sentences[-1]
        
        # å‘é€æœ€åçš„ç¼“å†²åŒºå†…å®¹
        if buffer.strip():
            try:
                lines = buffer.strip().split('\n')
                for line in lines:
                    line = line.strip()
                    if line:
                        await send_private_message(line, receive_id)
            except Exception as e:
                print_stream(f"[æœ€ç»ˆå†…å®¹å‘é€å¤±è´¥] {str(e)}")
    
    except Exception as e:
        print_stream(f"[å¤„ç†æ¶ˆæ¯å¼‚å¸¸] {str(e)}")
    finally:
        global_sum_message -= 1

async def upload_file(file_name: str, content: str) -> dict:
    """ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶"""
    with tempfile.NamedTemporaryFile(mode='wb', delete=False, suffix=os.path.splitext(file_name)[1]) as tmp_file:
        tmp_file.write(content.encode('utf-8'))
        tmp_path = tmp_file.name
    
    try:
        data = aiohttp.FormData()
        data.add_field('file', 
                      open(tmp_path, 'rb'),
                      filename=file_name,
                      content_type='text/plain')
        
        async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
            async with session.post(
                "https://www.boxim.online/api/file/upload",
                headers={"accesstoken": global_auth_info["access_token"]},
                data=data
            ) as response:
                result = await response.json()
                print_stream(f"[æ–‡ä»¶æ ¼å¼åŒ–ç»“æœé¢„è§ˆ]:\n{content[:500]}")
                return result
    finally:
        try:
            os.unlink(tmp_path)
        except:
            pass

# ===== ç¾¤ç»„ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿ =====
async def group_member_muted(group_id: int, isMuted: bool, userIds: list):
    """ç¦è¨€/è§£ç¦ç¾¤æˆå‘˜"""
    url = "https://www.boxim.online/api/group/members/muted"
    headers = {
        "accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*",
        "accesstoken": global_auth_info["access_token"],
        "content-type": "application/json",
    }
    
    payload = {
        "groupId": group_id,
        "userIds": userIds,
        "isMuted": isMuted
    }
    
    try:
        async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
            async with session.put(url, headers=headers, json=payload) as response:
                data = await response.json()
                if response.status != 200:
                    return {"error": f"HTTP error {response.status}", "data": data}
                return data
    except aiohttp.ClientError as e:
        return {"error": f"HTTP error: {str(e)}"}
    except Exception as e:
        return {"error": f"Unexpected error: {str(e)}"}

async def check_user_is_manager(group_id: int, user_id: int) -> bool:
    """æ£€æŸ¥ç”¨æˆ·æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç¾¤ç®¡ç†å‘˜"""
    url = f"https://www.boxim.online/api/group/members/{group_id}"
    headers = {
        "accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*",
        "accesstoken": global_auth_info["access_token"],
    }
    
    try:
        async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
            async with session.get(url, headers=headers) as response:
                if response.status != 200:
                    print_stream(f"è¯·æ±‚å¤±è´¥ï¼ŒçŠ¶æ€ç : {response.status}")
                    return False
                
                data = await response.json()
                if data.get("code") != 200 or not isinstance(data.get("data"), list):
                    print_stream("å“åº”æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼å¼‚å¸¸")
                    return False
                
                for member in data["data"]:
                    if member.get("userId") == user_id:
                        return bool(member.get("isManager", False))
                
                print_stream(f"æœªæ‰¾åˆ°ç”¨æˆ·ID: {user_id}")
                return False
                
    except aiohttp.ClientError as e:
        print_stream(f"ç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚é”™è¯¯: {e}")
        return False
    except Exception as e:
        print_stream(f"æœªçŸ¥é”™è¯¯: {e}")
        return False

async def send_message(message: str, group_id: int) -> Dict:
    """å‘é€ç¾¤ç»„æ¶ˆæ¯"""
    global global_auth_info, GROUP_BLACKLIST, dynamic_blacklist
    
    group_id_str = str(group_id)
    print_stream(f"[æµå¼è¾“å‡ºéƒ¨åˆ†: {message}]")
    if group_id_str in GROUP_BLACKLIST or group_id_str in dynamic_blacklist:
        print_stream(f"[å¿½ç•¥é»‘åå•ç¾¤ç»„ {group_id_str} çš„æ¶ˆæ¯å‘é€]")
        return {"error": "group in blacklist"}
    
    url = "https://www.boxim.online/api/message/group/send"
    headers = {
        "accept": "application/json, text/plain, */*",
        "accesstoken": global_auth_info["access_token"],
        "content-type": "application/json",
    }
    
    payload = {
        "groupId": group_id,
        "content": message,
        "type": 0,
        "atUserIds": [],
        "quoteMessage": None
    }
    
    try:
        async with aiohttp.ClientSession() as session:
            async with session.post(url, headers=headers, json=payload) as response:
                response_data = await response.json()
                
                if response_data.get("code") == 500:
                    is_manager = await check_user_is_manager(group_id, 48132)
                    
                    if is_manager:
                        print_stream("[å°è¯•è§£é™¤ç¦è¨€]")
                        mute_result = await group_member_muted(group_id, False, [48132])
